meaning list.meaning: ຍົກເລີກ, ຍົກເລີກ
meaning list.sentence: The government plans to abolish the outdated law.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຍົກເລີກກົດໝາຍເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເອົາລູກອອກ, ການຫຼຸລູກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Abortion laws vary significantly between countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍການເອົາລູກອອກແມ່ນແຕກຕ່າງກັນຫຼາຍລະຫວ່າງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: absence, absence (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her absence from work raised concerns among her colleagues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂາດວຽກຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດຄວາມກັງວົນໃນບັນດາເພື່ອນຮ່ວມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ພົບ, ຂາດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Several students were absent from class today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມື້ນີ້ມີນັກຮຽນຈຳນວນໜຶ່ງຂາດຈາກຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂງ່, ໄຮ້ເຫດຜົນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The idea seemed absurd at first, but it worked perfectly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດດັ່ງກ່າວເບິ່ງຄືວ່າເປັນເລື່ອງຕະຫລົກໃນຕອນທໍາອິດ, ແຕ່ມັນເຮັດວຽກຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸດົມສົມບູນ, ອຸດົມສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: The region is known for its abundance of natural resources.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄວາມອຸດົມສົມບູນຂອງຊັບພະຍາກອນທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລ່ວງລະເມີດ, ການລ່ວງລະເມີດ
meaning list.sentence: The abuse of power by officials led to widespread protests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ໃຊ້​ອຳນາດ​ຂອງ​ເຈົ້າ​ໜ້າ​ທີ່​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ໃຊ້​ອຳນາດ ​ໄດ້​ພາ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂູດຮີດ, ການໃຊ້ໃນທາງທີ່ຜິດ
meaning list.sentence: He abused his position to gain personal benefits.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ລ່ວງລະເມີດຕໍາແຫນ່ງຂອງລາວເພື່ອບັນລຸຜົນປະໂຫຍດຂອງຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຮງຮຽນ, ໂຮງຮຽນເອກະຊົນ
meaning list.sentence: She graduated from a prestigious music academy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈົບຈາກສະຖາບັນດົນຕີທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລັ່ງ, ເລັ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: The car began to accelerate as it approached the highway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດ​ໄດ້​ເລີ່ມ​ເລັ່ງ​ເມື່ອ​ເຂົ້າ​ໃກ້​ທາງ​ດ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຮັບ, ອະນຸມັດ
meaning list.sentence: Her acceptance into the program was a great achievement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໄດ້ຮັບການຍອມຮັບເຂົ້າໃນໂຄງການແມ່ນຜົນສໍາເລັດອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂົ້າເຖິງໄດ້, ບັນລຸໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: The website is designed to be accessible to everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເວັບໄຊທ໌ໄດ້ຖືກອອກແບບເພື່ອໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນສາມາດເຂົ້າເຖິງໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳເລັດ, ສຳເລັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Graduating from college was a significant accomplishment for her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈົບການສຶກສາຈາກມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລແມ່ນເປັນຜົນສໍາເລັດອັນສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສອດຄ່ອງ, ຄວາມກົມກຽວກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The project was completed in accordance with the guidelines.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ສໍາເລັດຕາມຄໍາແນະນໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາມ​ນັ້ນ​ແລ້ວ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He was warned about the rules and behaved accordingly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກເຕືອນກ່ຽວກັບກົດລະບຽບແລະປະຕິບັດຕາມຄວາມເຫມາະສົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ, ຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ເນັ້ນຫນັກເຖິງຄວາມສໍາຄັນຂອງຄວາມໂປ່ງໃສແລະຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບຜິດຊອບ, ຮັບຜິດຊອບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Each team member is accountable for their own tasks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະມາຊິກທີມງານແຕ່ລະຄົນມີຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບຕໍ່ວຽກງານຂອງຕົນເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະສົມ, ລວບລວມ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: Over the years, she accumulated a large collection of books.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຊຸມປີມໍ່ໆມານີ້, ລາວໄດ້ລວບລວມປື້ມຈໍານວນຫລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະສົມ, ການສະສົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The accumulation of dust in the room was evident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະສົມຂີ້ຝຸ່ນຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງແມ່ນເຫັນໄດ້ຊັດເຈນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວຫາ, ກ່າວຫາ
meaning list.sentence: He denied the accusations made against him.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະຕິເສດການກ່າວຫາຕໍ່ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືກກ່າວຫາ, ຖືກກ່າວຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The accused appeared in court for the first time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈໍາເລີຍໄດ້ປາກົດຕົວຢູ່ໃນສານເປັນຄັ້ງທໍາອິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາຊິດ, ອາຊິດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Lemons have a high acid content.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາກ ນາວມີປະລິມານອາຊິດສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໄດ້ມາ, ການໄດ້ມາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company's recent acquisition of a rival firm was widely discussed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊື້ກິດຈະການທີ່ຜ່ານມາຂອງບໍລິສັດຄູ່ແຂ່ງໄດ້ຖືກປຶກສາຫາລືຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: Acre, ຫົວໜ່ວຍວັດແທກທີ່ດິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The farm spans over 50 acres of fertile land.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຟາມ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ມີ​ເນື້ອ​ທີ່​ທີ່​ອຸດົມສົມບູນ​ໄປ​ກວ່າ 50 ​ເຮັກຕາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເປີດໃຊ້ງານ, ການເປີດໃຊ້ງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The activation of the system took only a few minutes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເປີດໃຊ້ລະບົບໃຊ້ເວລາພຽງສອງສາມນາທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກເຄື່ອນໄຫວ, ນັກເຄື່ອນໄຫວ
meaning list.sentence: The activist organized a rally to support environmental protection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ເຄື່ອນ​ໄຫວ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ການ​ໂຮມ​ຊຸມນຸມ​ເພື່ອ​ສະໜັບສະໜູນ​ການ​ປົກ​ປັກ​ຮັກສາ​ສິ່ງ​ແວດ​ລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຫຼມ, ຮຸນແຮງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He felt an acute pain in his chest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກເຈັບປວດແຫຼມຢູ່ໃນຫນ້າເອິກຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປັບຕົວ, ການປັບຕົວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie is an adaptation of a best-selling novel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນການປັບຕົວຂອງນະວະນິຍາຍທີ່ຂາຍດີທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດຕິດ, ຍຶດຕິດ
meaning list.sentence: They adhere strictly to their traditions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຍຶດຖືປະເພນີຂອງຕົນຢ່າງເຂັ້ມງວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃກ້ຄຽງ, ໃກ້ຄຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant is adjacent to the hotel.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານແມ່ນຕິດກັບໂຮງແຮມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປັບ, ການຈັດລຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She made a small adjustment to the machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປັບຕົວເລັກນ້ອຍກັບເຄື່ອງຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດການ, ປະຕິບັດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The nurse will administer the medication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາບານຈະປະຕິບັດຢາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍລິຫານ, ບໍລິຫານ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He works in an administrative position at the university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ໃນຕໍາແຫນ່ງບໍລິຫານຢູ່ໃນມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຈັດການ, ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The administrator oversees the daily operations of the office.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການເບິ່ງແຍງການເຮັດວຽກປະຈໍາວັນຂອງຫ້ອງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ເຂົ້າ​, ອະ​ນຸ​ຍາດ​ໃຫ້​ເຂົ້າ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Admission to the museum is free on Sundays.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຂົ້າຫໍພິພິທະພັນແມ່ນບໍ່ເສຍຄ່າໃນວັນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄວລຸ້ນ, ຫນຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book is popular among adolescents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມດັ່ງກ່າວເປັນທີ່ນິຍົມໃນກຸ່ມໄວລຸ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຮັບຮອງເອົາ, ການຮັບຮອງເອົາ
meaning list.sentence: The adoption process can take several months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂັ້ນຕອນການລ້ຽງລູກສາມາດໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບ, adverse (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The drug has some adverse side effects.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາດັ່ງກ່າວມີບາງຜົນຂ້າງຄຽງທາງລົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງກັນ, ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ, ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She is an advocate for women's rights.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງເປັນຜູ້ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນສິດທິຂອງແມ່ຍິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມງາມ, ກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມງາມ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The building's design is both functional and aesthetic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກແບບຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນມີທັງປະໂຫຍດແລະຄວາມງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັກ, ຄວາມເມດຕາ
meaning list.sentence: She showed great affection for her family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ສະແດງ​ຄວາມ​ຮັກ​ອັນ​ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່​ຕໍ່​ຄອບຄົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ, ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The aftermath of the hurricane was devastating.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນສະທ້ອນຂອງພະຍຸເຮີລິເຄນແມ່ນຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຮຸກຮານ, ການໂຈມຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dog's aggression was caused by fear.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຮຸກຮານຂອງຫມາແມ່ນຍ້ອນຄວາມຢ້ານກົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ກະ​ສິ​ກໍາ
meaning list.sentence: The region's economy is heavily dependent on agricultural activities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສດຖະກິດຂອງພາກພື້ນສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ແມ່ນຂຶ້ນກັບກິດຈະກໍາກະສິກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍ, ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The president's aide handled the scheduling.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍຂອງປະທານາທິບໍດີໄດ້ຈັດການໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ, ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ (ການສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: He finally agreed to the proposal, albeit reluctantly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນ​ທີ່​ສຸດ ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຍອມ​ຮັບ​ຂໍ້​ສະ​ເໜີ​ນັ້ນ, ເຖິງ​ແມ່ນ​ວ່າ​ບໍ່​ເຕັມ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕືອນ, ລະວັງ, ເຕືອນ (ຄຳນາມ, ຄຳນາມ, ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The soldiers remained alert throughout the night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານ​ຍັງ​ມີ​ການ​ເຕືອນ​ສະຕິ​ຕະຫຼອດ​ຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ່າງປະເທດ, ຜິດປົກກະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: The customs of the new country felt alien to her.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເພນີຂອງປະເທດໃຫມ່ເບິ່ງຄືວ່າຕ່າງປະເທດສໍາລັບລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອຈັດແຖວ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The technician aligned the wheels of the car.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງຈັດວາງລໍ້ຂອງລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສອດຄ່ອງ, ກົມກຽວກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The alignment of the planets was a rare sight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສອດຄ່ອງຂອງດາວເຄາະແມ່ນເປັນຕາທີ່ຫາຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ້າຍຄືກັນ, ຄືກັນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ, ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The twins look so alike that it's hard to tell them apart.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝາແຝດແມ່ນຄ້າຍຄືກັນຫຼາຍທີ່ມັນຍາກທີ່ຈະບອກພວກເຂົາອອກຈາກກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກ່າວຫາ, ການກ່າວຫາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The allegations against him were proven false.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ກ່າວຫາຕໍ່ລາວໄດ້ຖືກພິສູດວ່າບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າງ, ເອົາໄປຂ້າງໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The witness alleged that she saw the suspect near the scene.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເຫັນເຫດການອ້າງວ່າ ໄດ້ເຫັນຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບບ່ອນເກີດເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວຫາ, ກ່າວຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The suspect allegedly fled the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ຕ້ອງ​ສົງ​ໄສ​ໄດ້​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນທະມິດ, ການລວມຕົວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two nations formed an alliance to address common threats.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ພັນທະ​ມິດ​ເພື່ອ​ແກ້​ໄຂ​ໄພ​ຂົ່ມ​ຂູ່​ທົ່ວ​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັດສັນ, ຈັດສັນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The manager allocated resources to the most urgent projects.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ຈັດສັນຊັບພະຍາກອນໃຫ້ກັບໂຄງການທີ່ຮີບດ່ວນທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດສັນ, ການແຈກຢາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The allocation of funds was approved by the committee.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈັດສັນກອງທຶນໄດ້ຮັບການອະນຸມັດຈາກຄະນະກໍາມະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ເງິນອຸດໜູນ, ເງິນອຸດໜູນ
meaning list.sentence: She received a monthly allowance from her parents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບເງິນອຸດໜູນປະຈໍາເດືອນຈາກຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝູ່, ໝູ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country sought new allies to strengthen its defense.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຊອກຫາພັນທະມິດໃໝ່ ເພື່ອສ້າງຄວາມເຂັ້ມແຂງດ້ານປ້ອງກັນຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາລູມິນຽມ
meaning list.sentence: The frame of the bike is made of lightweight aluminium.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອບຂອງລົດຖີບແມ່ນເຮັດຈາກອາລູມິນຽມນ້ໍາຫນັກເບົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກສມັກເລ່ນ, ບໍ່ເປັນມືອາຊີບ (ຄຳນາມ, ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He participated in the tournament as an amateur player.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນເປັນນັກສມັກເລ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອກອັກຄະລັດຖະທູດ
meaning list.sentence: The ambassador hosted a reception at the embassy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ເອກ​ອັກຄະ​ລັດຖະທູດ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້ການ​ຕ້ອນຮັບ​ຢູ່​ສະຖານທູດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງ, ແກ້ໄຂ
meaning list.sentence: The government plans to amend the existing labor laws.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະປ່ຽນກົດໝາຍແຮງງານທີ່ມີຢູ່ແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປ່ຽນແປງ, ການແກ້ໄຂ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The amendment to the constitution was approved last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ດັດ​ແກ້​ລັດຖະທຳ​ມະນູນ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ອະນຸມັດ​ໃນ​ປີ​ກາຍ​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ລະຫວ່າງ, ກາງ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The speech was given amid loud applause.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳປາໄສດັ່ງກ່າວ ໄດ້ມີຂຶ້ນທ່າມກາງສຽງຕົບມືຢ່າງແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຽບທຽບ, ປຽບທຽບ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher used an analogy to explain the concept.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຈານໃຊ້ການປຽບທຽບເພື່ອອະທິບາຍແນວຄວາມຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: Anchor, stabilizer (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ship dropped its anchor near the shore.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອ​ໄດ້​ຖິ້ມ​ບ່ອນ​ຈອດ​ເຮືອ​ໃກ້​ຝັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທວະດາ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: She looked like an angel in her white dress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງເບິ່ງຄືວ່ານາງຟ້າໃນຊຸດສີຂາວຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: Anonymous, anonymous (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The donor chose to remain anonymous.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ໃຫ້ທຶນເລືອກທີ່ຈະບໍ່ເປີດເຜີຍຊື່.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸປະກອນ, ອຸປະກອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The laboratory is equipped with modern scientific apparatus.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫ້ອງທົດລອງແມ່ນມີອຸປະກອນວິທະຍາສາດທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມ.

meaning list.meaning: ດຶງດູດ, ດຶງດູດໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The idea of a vacation in the mountains sounds very appealing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດຂອງວັນພັກຢູ່ໃນພູເຂົາຟັງເບິ່ງຫນ້າສົນໃຈຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຢາກອາຫານ
meaning list.sentence: She lost her appetite after hearing the bad news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສູນເສຍຄວາມຢາກອາຫານຫຼັງຈາກໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົບມື, ຊື່ນຊົມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The audience applauded loudly after the performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​, ຜູ້​ຊົມ​ໄດ້​ຕົບ​ມື​ສຽງ​ດັງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ນຳໃຊ້ໄດ້, ຖືກຕ້ອງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The discount is only applicable to online purchases.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສ່ວນຫຼຸດໃຊ້ກັບການຊື້ອອນໄລນ໌ເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ, ມອບໝາຍ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The board decided to appoint a new CEO.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະກໍາມະການບໍລິຫານໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ CEO ໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຊື່ນຊົມ, ຄຸນຄ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her hard work was met with great appreciation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກຂອງລາວໄດ້ຮັບການຍົກຍ້ອງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: arbitrary, ສຸ່ມ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The decision seemed arbitrary and without much thought.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ເບິ່ງ​ຄື​ວ່າ arbitrary ແລະ​ເຮັດ​ໄດ້​ໂດຍ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ການ​ຄິດ​ຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວກັບສະຖາປັດຕະຍະກໍາ
meaning list.sentence: The city is known for its architectural beauty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະຄອນແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄວາມງາມສະຖາປັດຕະຍະກໍາຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: Archive (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The library contains an extensive archive of historical documents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍສະໝຸດມີບ່ອນເກັບມ້ຽນເອກະສານປະຫວັດສາດອັນກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜາມກິລາ, ເວທີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The concert was held in a large sports arena.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອນເສີດດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຈັດຂຶ້ນໃນສະຫນາມກິລາຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: arguably, ອາດຈະເປັນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She is arguably the best player on the team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ນທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດຂອງທີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂນ, ປະກອບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The soldiers were armed with advanced weapons.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານ​ໄດ້​ຕິດ​ອາວຸດ​ທີ່​ກ້າວໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ລຳດັບ, ລຳດັບ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The store offers a wide array of products.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທາງຮ້ານມີສິນຄ້າຫຼາກຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະແດງອອກ, ສະແດງອອກ
meaning list.sentence: He is able to articulate his thoughts clearly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສາມາດສະແດງຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວຢ່າງຊັດເຈນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ເທົ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The volcano left the entire region covered in ash.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພູເຂົາໄຟໄດ້ປົກຄຸມພື້ນທີ່ທັງໝົດດ້ວຍຂີ້ເຖົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມປາຖະໜາ, ເປົ້າໝາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her aspiration is to become a successful artist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມປາຖະຫນາຂອງລາວແມ່ນເພື່ອກາຍເປັນນັກສິລະປິນທີ່ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາດຖະໜາ, ມຸ່ງໝາຍ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He aspires to lead the company one day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັ້ງເປົ້າທີ່ຈະດໍາເນີນການບໍລິສັດໃນມື້ຫນຶ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລອບສັງຫານ
meaning list.sentence: The assassination of the president shocked the nation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລອບສັງຫານປະທານາທິບໍດີ ເຮັດໃຫ້ປະເທດຊາດຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຈມຕີ, ການໂຈມຕີ (ນາມ, ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The victim reported the assault to the police.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເຄາະຮ້າຍໄດ້ລາຍງານການໂຈມຕີຕໍ່ຕໍາຫຼວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລວບລວມ, ໂຮມກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The workers assembled the parts of the machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານປະກອບຊິ້ນສ່ວນຂອງເຄື່ອງຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຊຸມ, ປະຊຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The students gathered for the morning assembly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ສຶກ​ສາ​ໄດ້​ເຕົ້າ​ໂຮມ​ກັນ​ໃນ​ຕອນ​ເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າງ, ເອົາໄປຂ້າງໜ້າ
meaning list.sentence: He asserted his innocence during the trial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ອ້າງເອົາຄວາມບໍລິສຸດຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງການທົດລອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກາດ, ອ້າງສິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His assertion was backed by strong evidence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຮຽກຮ້ອງຂອງລາວໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນໂດຍຫຼັກຖານທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ, ຮັບປະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The company gave its customers an assurance of quality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສະຫນອງການຮັບປະກັນຄຸນນະພາບໃຫ້ແກ່ລູກຄ້າຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລີ້ໄພ, ທີ່ພັກອາໄສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The refugees sought asylum in a neighboring country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວ​ອົບ​ພະ​ຍົບ​ຂໍ​ລີ້​ໄພ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ປະ​ເທດ​ໃກ້​ຄຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຫດຮ້າຍ, ໂຫດຮ້າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The world was shocked by the atrocity committed during the war.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກໄດ້ຕົກໃຈກັບຄວາມໂຫດຮ້າຍທີ່ເກີດຂື້ນໃນລະຫວ່າງສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັນລຸ, ເພື່ອໃຫ້ໄດ້ຮັບ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She worked hard to attain her goals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກຫນັກເພື່ອບັນລຸເປົ້າຫມາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ, ການເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: The teacher took attendance at the beginning of the class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໃນຕອນເລີ່ມຕົ້ນຂອງບົດຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະນາຍຄວາມ, ທະນາຍຄວາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The attorney represented her in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຍຄວາມໄດ້ເປັນຕົວແທນຂອງລາວຢູ່ໃນສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນ​ລັກ​ສະ​ນະ, ຄຸນ​ລັກ​ສະ​ນະ (ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Kindness is an important attribute in a leader.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຸນລັກສະນະທີ່ສໍາຄັນໃນຜູ້ນໍາແມ່ນມີຄວາມເມດຕາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກມັດ, ຄຸນລັກສະນະ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: He attributed his success to hard work and determination.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖືວ່າຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງລາວແມ່ນມາຈາກການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກແລະຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກວດສອບ, ການກວດສອບ
meaning list.sentence: The company is undergoing an annual financial audit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຮັບການກວດສອບທາງດ້ານການເງິນປະຈໍາປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທ້ຈິງ, ຕົ້ນສະບັບ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant serves authentic Italian cuisine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານມີອາຫານອິຕາລຽນຕົ້ນສະບັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະນຸມັດ, ອະນຸມັດ
meaning list.sentence: The manager authorized the purchase of new equipment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການໄດ້ອະນຸມັດການຊື້ອຸປະກອນໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ລົດໃຫຍ່, ລົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He bought a new auto last week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊື້ລົດໃຫມ່ໃນອາທິດທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: Autonomy, autonomy (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The region has been granted greater autonomy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນໄດ້ຮັບການປົກຄອງຕົນເອງຫຼາຍຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມພ້ອມ, ການເຂົ້າເຖິງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The availability of fresh water is essential for life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການມີນ້ໍາຈືດແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລໍຖ້າ, ກຽມພ້ອມ
meaning list.sentence: We eagerly await the results of the competition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາກໍາລັງຊອກຫາຕໍ່ກັບຜົນໄດ້ຮັບຂອງການແຂ່ງຂັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຫຼັງ, ສາກຫຼັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The mountains provide a stunning backdrop for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພູເຂົາໄດ້ສະຫນອງສິ່ງຫຍໍ້ທໍ້ທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈສໍາລັບຕົວເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project has the full backing of the local government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່ຈາກລັດຖະບານທ້ອງຖິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຮອງ, ຮອງຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Always keep a backup of your important files.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະເຫມີຮັກສາສໍາຮອງຂໍ້ມູນຂອງໄຟລ໌ທີ່ສໍາຄັນຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກັນຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: The judge set bail at $10,000.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ພິພາກສາ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້​ປະກັນ​ຕົວ​ໃນ​ລາຄາ 10,000 ​ໂດ​ລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງຄະແນນສຽງ, ບັດລົງຄະແນນສຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The results of the ballot were announced today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນ​ການ​ລົງ​ຄະ​ແນນ​ສຽງ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ປະ​ກາດ​ໃນ​ມື້​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້າຍໂຄສະນາ, ປ້າຍໂຄສະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The protesters carried banners with slogans.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ໄດ້​ຖື​ປ້າຍ​ໂຄ​ສະ​ນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປືອຍກາຍ, ເປີດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He walked on the beach with bare feet.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍ່າງຢູ່ເທິງຫາດຊາຍດ້ວຍຕີນເປົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖັງ, ຖັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The oil was stored in large barrels.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ໍາມັນໄດ້ຖືກເກັບໄວ້ໃນຖັງຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: Bass (ສຽງ, ດົນຕີ) (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bass in the song is very powerful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງເບດໃນເພງແມ່ນແຂງແຮງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີດ້ວຍໄມ້ຕີ, ຕີບານ
meaning list.sentence: He batted the ball out of the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕີບານແລະສົ່ງມັນອອກຈາກສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະໜາມຮົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The battlefield was covered in smoke and debris.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະ​ໜາມ​ຮົບ​ໄດ້​ປົກ​ຄຸມ​ໄປ​ດ້ວຍ​ຄວັນ​ໄຟ​ແລະ​ຊາກ​ຫັກ​ພັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່າວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The small fishing village is located by a beautiful bay.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝູ່​ບ້ານ​ຫາ​ປາ​ນ້ອຍ​ຕັ້ງ​ຢູ່​ອ່າວ​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ray, beam (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A beam of light shone through the window.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແສງໄຟສ່ອງຜ່ານປ່ອງຢ້ຽມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັດປະຫລາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The villagers were terrified of the mythical beast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວບ້ານຢ້ານສັດຊື່ນິທານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນນາມຂອງ, ເປັນຕົວແທນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He accepted the award on behalf of his team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບລາງວັນໃນນາມຂອງທີມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ຮັກ, ຮັກຫຼາຍ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her beloved pet passed away yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັດລ້ຽງທີ່ຮັກຂອງລາວໄດ້ເສຍຊີວິດມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ບ່ອນນັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They sat on a bench in the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້ານັ່ງຢູ່ເທິງຕັ່ງນັ່ງຢູ່ໃນສວນສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: criterion, criterion (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: This test is used as a benchmark for performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົດສອບນີ້ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ເປັນມາດຕະຖານສໍາລັບການປະຕິບັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາຍໃຕ້, ຂ້າງລຸ່ມ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The treasure was buried beneath the old oak tree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົມບັດໄດ້ຖືກຝັງໄວ້ພາຍໃຕ້ຕົ້ນໂອ໊ກເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຮັບຜົນປະໂຫຍດ, ຜົນປະໂຫຍດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization is the primary beneficiary of the donation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງແມ່ນຜູ້ທີ່ໄດ້ຮັບຜົນປະໂຫຍດຕົ້ນຕໍຈາກການບໍລິຈາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ທໍລະຍົດ, ທໍລະຍົດ
meaning list.sentence: He felt betrayed by his closest friends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກຖືກທໍລະຍົດໂດຍຫມູ່ເພື່ອນທີ່ໃກ້ຊິດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່, ສົມທົບ
meaning list.sentence: They used ropes to bind the logs together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າໃຊ້ເຊືອກເພື່ອມັດໄມ້ທ່ອນເຂົ້າກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີວະປະວັດ, ຊີວິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The biography details the artist's early struggles.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊີວະປະຫວັດຫຍໍ້ຂອງການຕໍ່ສູ້ໃນຕົ້ນໆຂອງນັກສິລະປິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bishop led the ceremony at the cathedral.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອະທິການໄດ້ນໍາພາພິທີໃນວິຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປກ, ແປກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The story had a bizarre twist at the end.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການບິດເບືອນທີ່ແປກປະຫລາດໃນຕອນທ້າຍຂອງເລື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີດ, ສ່ວນຕັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The blade of the knife was extremely sharp.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສ່ວນການຕັດຂອງມີດແມ່ນແຫຼມທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ, ລະເບີດ (ຄຳນາມ, ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The blast destroyed several buildings in the area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ເຫດ​ລະ​ເບີດ​ໄດ້​ທຳລາຍ​ອາຄານ​ຫຼາຍ​ຫຼັງ​ໃນ​ເຂດ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລືອດອອກ
meaning list.sentence: He started to bleed after cutting his finger.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງຈາກຕັດນິ້ວມືຂອງລາວ, ມັນເລີ່ມມີເລືອດອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສົມ, ປະສົມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ, ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This tea is a blend of several different herbs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊານີ້ແມ່ນປະສົມຂອງຢາສະຫມຸນໄພຫຼາຍຊະນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ພອນ, ອວຍພອນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The priest blessed the congregation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະໂລຫິດໄດ້ອະທິຖານເພື່ອປະຊາຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພອນ, ບໍ່ມີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Good health is a true blessing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການມີສຸຂະພາບດີເປັນພອນທີ່ແທ້ຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂອ້ອວດ, ໂອ້ອວດ
meaning list.sentence: She boasted about her excellent exam results.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເວົ້າໂອ້ອວດກ່ຽວກັບຜົນການສອບເສັງທີ່ດີເລີດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂບນັດ, ການຈ່າຍເງິນເພີ່ມເຕີມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Employees received a bonus for their hard work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານໄດ້ຮັບເງິນໂບນັດສໍາລັບການເຮັດວຽກຫນັກຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະເບີດ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງກະທັນຫັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The technology sector experienced a significant boom.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະແຫນງເຕັກໂນໂລຢີໄດ້ປະສົບກັບການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດ
meaning list.sentence: The ball bounced off the wall and hit the floor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບານ​ໄດ້​ກະ​ໂດດ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ກຳ​ແພງ​ຫີນ​ແລະ​ຕົກ​ໃສ່​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາຍແດນ, ຊາຍແດນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The river marks the boundary between the two countries.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແມ່ນ້ຳ​ກຳນົດ​ເສັ້ນ​ຊາຍ​ແດນ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: bow, bow (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The performers bowed to the audience at the end of the play.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຕອນທ້າຍຂອງການຫຼິ້ນ, ນັກສະແດງໄດ້ກົ້ມຫົວໃຫ້ຜູ້ຊົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົ້ມ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The violinist tightened the bow before playing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ໄວ​ໂອ​ລິນ​ໄດ້​ຮັດ​ຄັນ​ທະ​ນູ​ໄວ້​ກ່ອນ​ຫຼິ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະເມີດ, ການຂັດຂວາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The breach of contract led to legal action.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລະເມີດສັນຍານໍາໄປສູ່ການດໍາເນີນຄະດີຕາມກົດຫມາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເມີດ, ເຈາະ
meaning list.sentence: Hackers breached the company's security system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຮກເກີລະເມີດລະບົບຄວາມປອດໄພຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັງທະລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The car had a breakdown on the highway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດເສຍຫຼັກເສຍຫຼັກຕົກໃສ່ທາງຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະດິດສ້າງທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່, ຄວາມກ້າວຫນ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist achieved a major breakthrough in cancer research.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ມີຄວາມຄືບຫນ້າຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນການຄົ້ນຄວ້າມະເຮັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະລິດ, ປູກຝັງ
meaning list.sentence: They breed horses on their farm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາລ້ຽງມ້າຢູ່ໃນຟາມຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະກຸນ, ຊະນິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This dog breed is known for its intelligence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວພັນຫມານີ້ແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບສະຕິປັນຍາຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: Broadband, ອິນເຕີເນັດຄວາມໄວສູງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company offers affordable broadband services.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໃຫ້ບໍລິການບໍລະອົດແບນລາຄາບໍ່ແພງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວທ່ອງເວັບອິນເຕີເນັດ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ປ່າເຖື່ອນ, ໂຫດຮ້າຍ

meaning list.meaning: buck, stag (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He paid ten bucks for the meal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈ່າຍເງິນສິບໂດລາສໍາລັບອາຫານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫມູ່ທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He invited his buddies over for a game night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເຊື້ອເຊີນເພື່ອນມິດຂອງລາວສໍາລັບຄືນເກມ.

meaning list.meaning: Buffer, ຜູ້ປົກປ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A buffer zone was created between the two conflicting groups.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂດກັນຊົນໄດ້ຖືກສ້າງຂຶ້ນລະຫວ່າງສອງກຸ່ມທີ່ຂັດແຍ້ງກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: heap, ປະລິມານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bulk of the work was completed yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ໄດ້ສໍາເລັດໃນມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ, ຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ

meaning list.sentence translation: ພາລະທາງການເງິນຂອງໂຄງການແມ່ນສູງເກີນໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປົກຄອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The process was delayed due to excessive bureaucracy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະ​ບວນ​ການ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຊັກ​ຊ້າ​ເນື່ອງ​ຈາກ​ການ bureaucracy ຫຼາຍ​ເກີນ​ໄປ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຝັງ, ຝັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The burial took place in a small village cemetery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຝັງສົບໄດ້ຈັດຂຶ້ນໃນປ່າຊ້າບ້ານຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ, overflow (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The balloon burst with a loud bang.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປູມເປົ້າລະເບີດດ້ວຍສຽງດັງດັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະພາ, ສະພາລັດຖະມົນຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The kitchen cabinet is filled with spices.

meaning list.meaning: ສະພາລັດຖະມົນຕີຂອງລັດຖະບານ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຄິດ​ໄລ່​, ການ​ຄາດ​ຄະ​ເນ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The engineer double-checked the calculations before starting construction.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ້າໃບ, ຜ້າໜາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist painted a beautiful landscape on the canvas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຈິດຕະກອນໄດ້ແຕ້ມຮູບພູມສັນຖານທີ່ສວຍງາມຢູ່ເທິງຜ້າໃບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສາມາດ, ຄວາມສາມາດ

meaning list.meaning: ທຶນນິຍົມ

meaning list.meaning: ນາຍທຶນ, ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບທຶນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He believes in the capitalist system of free markets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຊື່ອໃນລະບົບທຶນນິຍົມຕະຫຼາດເສລີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິນຄ້າ, ສິນຄ້າ

meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳ​ປັ່ນ​ບັນທຸກ​ສິນຄ້າ​ຂະໜາດ​ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂົນສົ່ງ, wagon (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The train's first carriage was reserved for first-class passengers.

meaning list.meaning: ແກະສະຫຼັກ, ແກະສະຫຼັກ

meaning list.meaning: ບາດເຈັບ, ບາດເຈັບ ຫຼື ເສຍຊີວິດ (ນາມ)

meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸບັດ​ເຫດ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ມີ​ຜູ້​ເສຍ​ຊີວິດ​ຫຼາຍ​ຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍການ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ, ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ (verb)

meaning list.meaning: ງົວ, ງົວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The farmer raises cattle for milk production.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕືອນ, ເຕືອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sign read 'Caution: Wet Floor'.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ້າຍຂຽນວ່າ 'ລະວັງ: ພື້ນປຽກ'.

meaning list.meaning: ລະມັດລະວັງ, ລະມັດລະວັງ

meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສະເຫມີປະຕິບັດຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງໃນເວລາທີ່ເຮັດການຕັດສິນໃຈທາງດ້ານການເງິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢຸດ, ສິ້ນສຸດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company decided to cease operations in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈຢຸດການດໍາເນີນງານໃນພາກພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The cemetery was quiet and peaceful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຸສານແມ່ນງຽບສະຫງົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫ້ອງ, ຫ້ອງ (ນາມ)

meaning list.sentence translation: ກະສັດ​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ການ​ປະຊຸມ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ຫ້ອງ​ຂອງ​ກະສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມວຸ່ນວາຍ, ຄວາມວຸ້ນວາຍ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ບັນຍາຍ, ລັກສະນະ (verb)

meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນແມ່ນຖືກກໍານົດໂດຍສະພາບອາກາດຮ້ອນແລະແຫ້ງແລ້ງຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໜ່, ມະຫັດສະຈັນ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາເຊົ່າ, ສັນຍາເຊົ່າ

meaning list.meaning: ຊໍາເຮື້ອ, ຄົງທີ່ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She suffers from chronic back pain.

meaning list.meaning: ຊິ້ນໃຫຍ່, ມວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He cut the wood into large chunks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຕັດ​ໄມ້​ເປັນ​ຕ່ອນ​ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຍ່າງ, ກະຈາຍ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)

meaning list.meaning: ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ, ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The newspaper has a wide circulation in the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນັງ​ສື​ພິມ​ມີ​ການ​ໄຫຼ​ວຽນ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງ​ຂວາງ​ໃນ​ຕົວ​ເມືອງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຊາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She applied for U.S. citizenship last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍື່ນຂໍສັນຊາດສະຫະລັດໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວເມືອງ, ພົນລະເມືອງ
meaning list.sentence: The mayor praised the civic pride of the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າເມືອງຍ້ອງຍໍຄວາມພາກພູມໃຈຂອງພົນລະເມືອງຂອງຊຸມຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພົນລະເຮືອນ (ນາມ, ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The military works to protect civilian lives during conflicts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອປົກປ້ອງຊີວິດຂອງພົນລະເຮືອນໃນລະຫວ່າງການຂັດແຍ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຊັດເຈນ, ຄວາມຊັດເຈນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The clarity of her speech impressed the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຊັດເຈນຂອງຄໍາເວົ້າຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ຜູ້ຊົມປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະທະກັນ, ການປະທະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: There was a clash between protesters and police.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການປະທະກັນລະຫວ່າງພວກປະທ້ວງ ແລະຕຳຫຼວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດປະເພດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The classification of animals helps scientists study them better.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈັດປະເພດສັດຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ນັກວິທະຍາສາດສຶກສາພວກມັນໄດ້ດີຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດຕິດ, ຍຶດຕິດກັບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The child clung to her mother during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກຊາຍກອດແມ່ຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງພາຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງດ້ານຄລີນິກ, ຍຸດຕິທຳ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor performed a clinical examination of the patient.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍປະຕິບັດການກວດທາງດ້ານຄລີນິກຂອງຄົນເຈັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປິດ, ການຢຸດເຊົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company announced the closure of its factory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະກາດປິດໂຮງງານຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຸ່ມ, ກຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A cluster of stars was visible through the telescope.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຸ່ມດາວສາມາດເຫັນໄດ້ຜ່ານກ້ອງສ່ອງທາງໄກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັນທະມິດ, ຫຸ້ນສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two parties formed a coalition to govern the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ​ຝ່າຍ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຕັ້ງ​ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ເພື່ອ​ປົກ​ຄອງ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: coastal, ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ coast (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The coastal area is known for its beautiful beaches.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນແຄມທະເລແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຫາດຊາຍທີ່ສວຍງາມຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັອກເທນ, ປະສົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She ordered a fruity cocktail at the bar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສັ່ງຄັອກເທວໝາກໄມ້ຢູ່ແຖບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຕິປັນຍາ, ແນວຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: Cognitive development is essential in early childhood.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການພັດທະນາສະຕິປັນຍາມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນຫຼາຍໃນໄວເດັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງເອີນ, ມາພົບພ້ອມໆກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The festival coincides with the city's anniversary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານບຸນດັ່ງກ່າວກົງກັບວັນຄົບຮອບຂອງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ່ວມມື
meaning list.sentence: The two companies collaborated on the new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດທັງສອງໄດ້ຮ່ວມມືກັນກ່ຽວກັບໂຄງການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການຮ່ວມມື, ການຮ່ວມມື (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Their collaboration resulted in a successful product launch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຮ່ວມມືຂອງພວກເຂົາເຮັດໃຫ້ການເປີດຕົວຜະລິດຕະພັນປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົ່ວໄປ, ລວມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The decision was made through a collective effort.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ຂຶ້ນ​ໂດຍ​ຜ່ານ​ຄວາມ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ຮ່ວມ​ກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະທະກັນ, ການປະທະກັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two cars were damaged in the collision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດສອງຄັນໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍຈາກການປະທະກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອານານິຄົມ
meaning list.sentence: The museum features artifacts from the colonial period.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ວາງສະແດງວັດຖຸບູຮານຈາກຍຸກອານານິຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖັນແຖວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The columnist wrote an article about the recent election.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖັນ​ແຖວ​ນັກ​ຂ່າວ​ຂຽນ​ບົດ​ຄວາມ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ເລືອກ​ຕັ້ງ​ຄັ້ງ​ສຸດ​ທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງຄາມ, ສົງຄາມ
meaning list.sentence: The soldiers were trained for close combat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານໄດ້ຮັບການຝຶກອົບຮົມສໍາລັບການສູ້ຮົບຢ່າງໃກ້ຊິດ.

meaning list.sentence: The government is taking measures to combat crime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງໃຊ້ມາດຕະການຕ້ານອາດຊະຍາກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ, ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The meeting will commence at 10 a.m.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງປະຊຸມຈະເລີ່ມໃນເວລາ 10 ໂມງເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ອະ​ທິ​ບາຍ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The documentary includes expert commentary on the topic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາລະຄະດີປະກອບມີຄໍາຄິດຄໍາເຫັນຂອງຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານກ່ຽວກັບວິຊາດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປະກາດຂ່າວ, ຜູ້ປະກາດຂ່າວ
meaning list.sentence: The commentator provided insights during the live broadcast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງຄວາມຄິດເຫັນໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈໃນລະຫວ່າງການອອກອາກາດສົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄ້າ
meaning list.sentence: International commerce has grown significantly in recent years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຄ້າ​ສາ​ກົນ​ໄດ້​ເພີ່ມ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ​ໃນ​ຊຸມ​ປີ​ມໍ່ໆ​ມາ​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່, ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The commissioner announced new policies to improve safety.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກໍາມະການໄດ້ປະກາດນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່ເພື່ອປັບປຸງຄວາມປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິນຄ້າ, ສິນຄ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Oil is a valuable commodity in global markets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ຳມັນ​ເປັນ​ສິນຄ້າ​ອັນ​ລ້ຳ​ຄ່າ​ໃນ​ຕະຫຼາດ​ໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄອມມິວນິດ
meaning list.sentence: The book discusses the history of communist ideologies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ກ່າວເຖິງປະຫວັດສາດຂອງອຸດົມການຄອມມູນິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝູ່, ໝູ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dog was his faithful companion on long walks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝາເປັນຄູ່ທີ່ສັດຊື່ຂອງລາວໃນເວລາຍ່າງດົນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຽບທຽບ, ຄ້າຍຄືກັນ
meaning list.sentence: Their achievements are comparable in terms of impact.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນສໍາເລັດຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນປຽບທຽບໃນຜົນກະທົບຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເມດຕາ, ຄວາມເມດຕາ
meaning list.sentence: She showed great compassion for those in need.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະອົງ​ສະແດງ​ຄວາມ​ເມດຕາ​ສົງສານ​ຕໍ່​ຜູ້​ທີ່​ຂັດສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບັງຄັບ, ບັງຄັບ
meaning list.sentence: The circumstances compelled him to take immediate action.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານະການບັງຄັບໃຫ້ລາວປະຕິບັດທັນທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທັບໃຈ, ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer presented a compelling argument in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ນາຍ​ຄວາມ​ໄດ້​ນໍາ​ສະ​ເຫນີ​ການ​ໂຕ້​ຖຽງ​ທີ່​ຫນ້າ​ປະ​ທັບ​ໃຈ​ໃນ​ສານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົດເຊີຍ, ເພື່ອຊົດເຊີຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company promised to compensate customers for the inconvenience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດສັນຍາວ່າຈະຊົດເຊີຍລູກຄ້າສໍາລັບຄວາມບໍ່ສະດວກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າຊົດເຊີຍ, ຄ່າຊົດເຊີຍ
meaning list.sentence: She received compensation for the injuries she sustained.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບຄ່າຊົດເຊີຍສໍາລັບການບາດເຈັບຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສາມາດ, ຄວາມສາມາດ
meaning list.sentence: The job requires a high level of technical competence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກນີ້ຕ້ອງການຄວາມສາມາດດ້ານວິຊາການໃນລະດັບສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄວາມສາມາດ, ພຽງພໍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She is a highly competent lawyer with years of experience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນທະນາຍຄວາມທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດສູງທີ່ມີປະສົບການຫຼາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ລວບລວມ, ລວບລວມ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The editor compiled a list of the best articles for publication.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນນາທິການໄດ້ລວບລວມບັນຊີລາຍຊື່ເພື່ອເຜີຍແຜ່ບົດຄວາມທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອໃຫ້ສໍາເລັດ, ປັບຕົວ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The sauce perfectly complements the dish.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອດເສີມອາຫານຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບຊ້ອນ, ຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: The complexity of the problem required a detailed analysis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມສັບສົນຂອງບັນຫາຕ້ອງການການວິເຄາະລາຍລະອຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສາມັກຄີ, ການເຊື່ອຟັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company ensures compliance with safety regulations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດຮັບປະກັນການປະຕິບັດຕາມກົດລະບຽບຄວາມປອດໄພ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັບສົນ, ຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The surgery went well, but there were some minor complications.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຜ່າຕັດໄດ້ຜ່ານໄປດ້ວຍດີ, ແຕ່ມີບາງອາການແຊກຊ້ອນເລັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຕາມ, ເຊື່ອຟັງ
meaning list.sentence: All employees must comply with the company's policies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານທຸກຄົນຕ້ອງປະຕິບັດຕາມນະໂຍບາຍຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົງປະກອບ, ໂຄງສ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The composition of the painting is beautifully balanced.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງປະກອບຂອງຮູບແຕ້ມແມ່ນມີຄວາມສົມດູນທີ່ສວຍງາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະນີປະນອມ, ປະນີປະນອມ (ນາມ, ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The two sides reached a compromise after lengthy discussions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ​ຝ່າຍ​ໄດ້​ບັນລຸ​ການ​ປະນີປະນອມ​ພາຍຫຼັງ​ການ​ປຶກສາ​ຫາລື​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ດົນ​ນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄິດ​ໄລ່
meaning list.sentence: The software can quickly compute complex equations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອບແວສາມາດຄິດໄລ່ສົມຜົນທີ່ຊັບຊ້ອນໄດ້ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອງ, ຊ່ອນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She tried to conceal her disappointment from her friends.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມເຊື່ອງຄວາມຜິດຫວັງຂອງລາວຈາກຫມູ່ເພື່ອນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມຈຳນົນ
meaning list.sentence: He conceded that he had made a mistake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍອມຮັບວ່າລາວໄດ້ເຮັດຜິດພາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກແບບ, ຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: The architect conceived a unique design for the building.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖາປະນິກໄດ້ວາງແຜນການອອກແບບທີ່ເປັນເອກະລັກສໍາລັບອາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືພາ
meaning list.sentence: She conceived shortly after their wedding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ຖືພາບໍ່ດົນຫຼັງຈາກການແຕ່ງງານຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນວຄວາມຄິດ, ຄວາມເຂົ້າໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: His conception of freedom differs greatly from mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຄິດຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບເສລີພາບແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງແຕກຕ່າງຈາກຂ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖືພາ
meaning list.sentence: Conception marks the beginning of pregnancy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນວຄວາມຄິດແມ່ນຈຸດເລີ່ມຕົ້ນຂອງການຖືພາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳປະທານ, ປະນີປະນອມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Both sides made concessions to reach an agreement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັງ​ສອງ​ຝ່າຍ​ໄດ້​ສຳ​ປະທານ​ເພື່ອ​ບັນລຸ​ຂໍ້​ຕົກລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວໂທດ, ກ່າວໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The government condemned the attack as an act of terrorism.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານ​ໄດ້​ປະນາມ​ການ​ໂຈມ​ຕີ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ວ່າ​ເປັນ​ການ​ກໍ່​ການ​ຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຶກສາຫາລື, ສົນທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The board will confer on the matter tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະກໍາມະການຈະປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫາໃນມື້ອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຫ້, ນໍາສະເຫນີ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The university conferred an honorary degree on the scientist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີນັກວິທະຍາສາດທີ່ມີລະດັບກຽດຕິຍົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາລະພາບ
meaning list.sentence: The suspect made a full confession to the police.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສໄດ້ສາລະພາບຢ່າງເຕັມທີ່ຕໍ່ຕໍາຫຼວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ຕັ້ງ​ຄ່າ​, ການ​ຈັດ​ຕັ້ງ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The new software requires specific hardware configuration.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊອບແວໃຫມ່ຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີການຕັ້ງຄ່າຮາດແວສະເພາະ.

meaning list.meaning: confine, confine (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: The illness confined her to bed for weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍາດດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວນອນຢູ່ຫຼາຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການອະນຸມັດ, ການກວດສອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We are still waiting for confirmation of the booking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຍັງລໍຖ້າການຢືນຢັນການຈອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະເຊີນ ໜ້າ, ປະເຊີນ ໜ້າ ກັບ ຄຳ ກິລິຍາ
meaning list.sentence: She confronted him about his lies.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະເຊີນກັບຄວາມຕົວະຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ຫນ້າ​, ຂໍ້​ຂັດ​ແຍ່ງ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The confrontation between the two leaders escalated tensions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະ​ທະ​ກັນ​ລະຫວ່າງ​ຜູ້ນຳ​ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເພີ່ມ​ທະວີ​ຄວາມ​ເຄັ່ງ​ຕຶງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົມເຊີຍ
meaning list.sentence: We congratulated her on her promotion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຊົມເຊີຍລາວກ່ຽວກັບການສົ່ງເສີມຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸມຊົນ, ຊຸມຊົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The congregation gathered for Sunday service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຄົມໄດ້ເຕົ້າໂຮມກັນເພື່ອນະມັດສະການວັນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບກອງປະຊຸມໃຫຍ່
meaning list.sentence: The congressional committee met to discuss the new bill.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະ​ນະ​ກຳ​ມະ​ການ​ສະ​ພາ​ແຫ່ງ​ຊາດ​ໄດ້​ພົບ​ປະ​ປຶກ​ສາ​ຫາ​ລື​ຮ່າງ​ກົດ​ໝາຍ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຊະນະ, ເອົາຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: The Romans conquered vast territories during their reign.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວໂລມໄດ້ເອົາຊະນະດິນແດນທີ່ກວ້າງຂວາງໃນລະຫວ່າງການປົກຄອງຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດສຳນຶກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her conscience wouldn't allow her to ignore the situation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຕິຮູ້ສຶກຜິດຊອບຂອງລາວບໍ່ໄດ້ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ລາວບໍ່ສົນໃຈສະຖານະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຕິ, ສະຕິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He regained consciousness after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຟື້ນຟູສະຕິຫຼັງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕໍ່ກັນ, ຕິດຕໍ່ກັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The team has won five consecutive matches.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມຊະນະ 5 ນັດຕິດຕໍ່ກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອກະພາບ, ເອກະພາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The group reached a consensus on the project's goals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຸ່ມ​ໄດ້​ບັນລຸ​ຄວາມ​ເຫັນ​ດີ​ເຫັນ​ພ້ອມ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ເປົ້າ​ໝາຍ​ຂອງ​ໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍິນຍອມ, ອະນຸຍາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The patient gave her consent for the surgery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນເຈັບໃຫ້ການຍິນຍອມສໍາລັບການຜ່າຕັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍິນຍອມ, ຍອມ
meaning list.sentence: He consented to participate in the study.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຍິນຍອມທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໃນການສຶກສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກປັກຮັກສາ, ປົກປັກຮັກສາ
meaning list.sentence: Efforts are being made to conserve water in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວມ​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ເພື່ອ​ປົກ​ປັກ​ຮັກ​ສາ​ນ້ຳ​ໃນ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສອດຄ່ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The recipe requires a smooth consistency for the batter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສູດຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີຄວາມສອດຄ່ອງກ້ຽງສໍາລັບ dough ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງລວມ, ສັງລວມ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company plans to consolidate its operations in one location.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະລວມການດໍາເນີນງານຂອງຕົນຢູ່ໃນສະຖານທີ່ດຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂດເລືອກຕັ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The politician visited her constituency to meet voters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກການເມືອງໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມເຂດເລືອກຕັ້ງເພື່ອຕອບສະຫນອງຜູ້ລົງຄະແນນສຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້າງ, ປະກອບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: These documents constitute the foundation of the agreement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອກະສານເຫຼົ່ານີ້ເປັນພື້ນຖານຂອງຂໍ້ຕົກລົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັດຖະທຳມະນູນ, ໂຄງສ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The constitution guarantees basic rights to all citizens.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະທຳ​ມະນູນ​ຮັບປະກັນ​ສິດ​ພື້ນຖານ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ພົນລະ​ເມືອງ​ທັງ​ໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັດຖະທຳມະນູນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The law was declared unconstitutional by the court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຖືກ​ສານ​ປະກາດ​ວ່າ​ບໍ່​ເປັນ​ລັດຖະທຳ​ມະນູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ຈຳກັດ, ການບັງຄັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project faced financial constraints.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງ​ການ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ກັບ​ຂໍ້​ຈໍາ​ກັດ​ທາງ​ດ້ານ​ການ​ເງິນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ປຶກສາຫາລື, ປຶກສາຫາລື
meaning list.sentence: The decision was made after extensive consultation with experts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈໄດ້ຖືກປະຕິບັດຫຼັງຈາກການປຶກສາຫາລືຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງກັບຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄິດ, ອອກແບບ
meaning list.sentence: She contemplated her future career options.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພິຈາລະນາທາງເລືອກອາຊີບຂອງລາວໃນອະນາຄົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອັບອາຍ, ຄວາມດູຖູກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He showed contempt for their outdated ideas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຂົ້າຫາແນວຄວາມຄິດເກົ່າຂອງລາວດ້ວຍຄວາມກຽດຊັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ້າງ, ຕໍ່ສູ້
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer contended that his client was innocent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ນາຍ​ຄວາມ​ໄດ້​ອ້າງ​ວ່າ​ລູກ​ຄວາມ​ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ແມ່ນ​ບໍ​ລິ​ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ແຂ່ງ, ຄູ່ແຂ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a strong contender for the championship title.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຄູ່ແຂ່ງທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງສໍາລັບຫົວຂໍ້ແຊ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ພໍໃຈ, ພໍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: He was content with his simple life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສຸກກັບຊີວິດທີ່ລຽບງ່າຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຕ້ຖຽງ, ອ້າງສິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was contention over the proposed changes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການສົນທະນາກ່ຽວກັບການປ່ຽນແປງທີ່ສະເຫນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລື້ອຍໆ, ເລື້ອຍໆ
meaning list.sentence: The team is continually improving their performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານກໍາລັງປັບປຸງການປະຕິບັດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຮັບເໝົາ, ຜູ້ຮັບເໝົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The contractor completed the project on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຮັບເໝົາສຳເລັດໂຄງການຕາມກຳນົດເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັດແຍ້ງ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a contradiction between his words and actions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມຂັດແຍ້ງລະຫວ່າງຄໍາເວົ້າແລະການກະທໍາຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງກັນຂ້າມ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ (ນາມ, ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: On the contrary, I think it's a good idea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນທາງກົງກັນຂ້າມ, ຂ້າພະເຈົ້າຄິດວ່າມັນເປັນຄວາມຄິດທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປະກອບສ່ວນ, ຜູ້ຂຽນ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: She is a regular contributor to the magazine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກຂຽນປະຈຳວາລະສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປ່ຽນແປງ, ການປ່ຽນແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The conversion of the warehouse into an office was successful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຫັນປ່ຽນອາຄານສາງເປັນຫ້ອງການສຳເລັດຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວໂທດ
meaning list.sentence: The court convicted him of theft.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານໄດ້ຕັດສິນລົງໂທດລາວໃນຂໍ້ຫາລັກຂະໂມຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຊື່ອ, ຄວາມເຊື່ອ
meaning list.sentence: Her conviction in her beliefs inspired others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໝັ້ນຄົງໃນຄວາມເຊື່ອຂອງລາວໄດ້ດົນໃຈຄົນອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ່ວມມື, ເຮັດວຽກຮ່ວມກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The two companies agreed to cooperate on the new project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັງສອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈຮ່ວມມືໃນໂຄງການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ່ວມ​ມື​, ເຫມາະ​ສົມ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ຮ່ວມ​ກັນ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: She has a cooperative attitude towards her colleagues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີທັດສະນະທີ່ຮ່ວມມືກັບເພື່ອນຮ່ວມງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະສານງານ, ຈັດຕັ້ງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The manager coordinated the efforts of the entire team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການປະສານງານຄວາມພະຍາຍາມຂອງທີມງານທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ປະ​ສານ​ງານ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The project requires careful coordination between departments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີການປະສານງານຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງລະຫວ່າງພະແນກການ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປະສານງານ, ຜູ້ຈັດຕັ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The event coordinator ensured everything went smoothly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ປະສານງານເຫດການໄດ້ຮັບປະກັນວ່າທຸກຢ່າງເປັນໄປດ້ວຍດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍາຫລວດ
meaning list.sentence: The cop quickly responded to the emergency call.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ຕອບ​ຮັບ​ການ​ໂທ​ລະ​ສັບ​ສຸກ​ເສີນ​ຢ່າງ​ວ່ອງ​ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທອງແດງ
meaning list.sentence: The wires are made of pure copper.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາຍເຄເບີ້ນແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍທອງແດງບໍລິສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລິຂະສິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book is protected by copyright law.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມຖືກປົກປ້ອງໂດຍກົດໝາຍລິຂະສິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແກ້ໄຂ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher made corrections to the student's essay.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູ​ໄດ້​ແກ້​ໄຂ​ບົດ​ຄວາມ​ຂອງ​ນັກ​ຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມ​ໂຍງ, ເຊື່ອມ​ໂຍງ
meaning list.sentence: The study aims to correlate stress levels with productivity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາມີຈຸດປະສົງເພື່ອສ້າງການເຊື່ອມໂຍງລະຫວ່າງລະດັບຄວາມກົດດັນແລະຜົນຜະລິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່, ຄວາມສໍາພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There is a strong correlation between exercise and health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງລະຫວ່າງອອກກໍາລັງກາຍແລະສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດຕາມ, ກົງກັນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The results correspond to our initial hypothesis.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບແມ່ນສອດຄ່ອງກັບສົມມຸດຕິຖານທໍາອິດຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົດໝາຍ, ຈົດໝາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The correspondence between the two leaders was made public.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖະ​ແຫຼງ​ການ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ຜູ້​ນໍາ​ທັງ​ສອງ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ເປີດ​ເຜີຍ​ຕໍ່​ສາ​ທາ​ລະ​ນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຂ່າວ, ນັກຂ່າວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The foreign correspondent reported live from the conflict zone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ຂ່າວ​ຕ່າງປະ​ເທດ​ລາຍ​ງານ​ສົດ​ຈາກ​ເຂດ​ປະ​ທະ​ກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່​ສອດ​ຄ້ອງ​ກັນ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: Each item has a corresponding price listed next to it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຄາທີ່ສອດຄ້ອງກັນແມ່ນສະແດງຢູ່ຖັດຈາກແຕ່ລະຜະລິດຕະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສໍ້ລາດບັງຫຼວງ, ສໍ້ລາດບັງຫຼວງ
meaning list.sentence: The corrupt official accepted bribes for favors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່ສໍ້ລາດບັງຫຼວງຍອມຮັບສິນບົນເພື່ອແລກປ່ຽນກັບຄວາມໂປດປານ.

meaning list.meaning: ສໍ້ລາດບັງຫຼວງ, ສໍ້ລາດບັງຫຼວງ
meaning list.sentence: The government vowed to fight corruption in all sectors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້​ຄຳ​ໝັ້ນ​ສັນຍາ​ຕ້ານ​ການ​ສໍ້​ລາດ​ບັງ​ຫຼວງ​ໃນ​ທຸກ​ຂະ​ແໜງ​ການ.

meaning list.meaning: ແພງ, ແພງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The repair of the old car proved to be very costly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສ້ອມແປງລົດເກົ່າໄດ້ກາຍເປັນລາຄາແພງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະມາຊິກສະພາ
meaning list.sentence: The councillor proposed new policies for urban development.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີ່​ປຶກ​ສາ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ເຫນີ​ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃຫມ່​ການ​ພັດ​ທະ​ນາ​ຕົວ​ເມືອງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ປຶກສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The school offers counselling services for students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນໃຫ້ບໍລິການໃຫ້ຄໍາປຶກສາແກ່ນັກຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ປຶກສາ, ແນະນຳ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The counsellor helped her work through her anxiety.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີ່ປຶກສາໄດ້ຊ່ວຍລາວຮັບມືກັບຄວາມກັງວົນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ານ, ຕອບໂຕ້
meaning list.sentence: He countered the accusations with solid evidence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕອບໂຕ້ກັບຂໍ້ກ່າວຫາດັ່ງກ່າວດ້ວຍຫຼັກຖານທີ່ແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ກັນ, ຄົນທຽບເທົ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The foreign minister met his German counterpart.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ມົນ​ຕີ​ການ​ຕ່າງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ໄດ້​ພົບ​ປະ​ກັບ​ຄູ່​ຕຳ​ແໜ່ງ​ເຢຍ​ລະ​ມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: countless, ຫຼາຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She has made countless contributions to the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະກອບສ່ວນເຂົ້າໃນສັງຄົມນັບບໍ່ຖ້ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັດຖະປະຫານ, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວສຳເລັດຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: The military coup led to a change in government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ປະ​ຫານ​ຂອງ​ທະ​ຫານ​ພາ​ໃຫ້​ມີ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມສຸພາບ, ຄວາມສຸພາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He offered her his seat as a courtesy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ໃຫ້ບ່ອນນັ່ງຂອງນາງເປັນມາລະຍາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດດ້ວຍຝີມືດີ
meaning list.sentence: She crafted a beautiful vase from clay.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໂຖ​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ​ດ້ວຍ​ດິນ​ໜຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວາດ, ກວາດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The baby started to crawl at six months.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແອນ້ອຍເລີ່ມກວາດເມື່ອລາວອາຍຸໄດ້ຫົກເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ສ້າງ, ຜູ້ກໍ່ຕັ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The artist is the creator of this stunning sculpture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສິລະປິນເປັນຜູ້ສ້າງຮູບປັ້ນທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໜ້າເຊື່ອຖື, ຄວາມໜ້າເຊື່ອຖື (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new evidence undermined the credibility of his testimony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັກຖານໃໝ່ໄດ້ທຳລາຍຄວາມໜ້າເຊື່ອຖືຂອງປະຈັກພະຍານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້, ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້
meaning list.sentence: The journalist provided a credible source for the story.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຂ່າວໄດ້ສະຫນອງແຫຼ່ງທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ສໍາລັບເລື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລືອ, ກົ້ມຂຶ້ນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He tried to creep into the house without waking anyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມເຂົ້າໄປໃນເຮືອນໂດຍບໍ່ໄດ້ປຸກໃຜ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວິພາກວິຈານ, ການປະເມີນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The professor gave a detailed critique of the research paper.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາດສະດາຈານໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາວິຈານລາຍລະອຽດຂອງເອກະສານການຄົ້ນຄວ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ມົງກຸດ, ຄອບຄອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The king placed the golden crown on his head.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະສັດ​ໄດ້​ວາງ​ມົງກຸດ​ຄຳ​ໄວ້​ເທິງ​ຫົວ​ຂອງ​ເພິ່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດິບ, ບໍ່ໄດ້ປຸງແຕ່ງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Crude oil is refined to produce gasoline.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ຳມັນດິບຖືກກັ່ນເພື່ອຜະລິດນ້ຳມັນແອັດຊັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕຳ, ຕຳ
meaning list.sentence: The machine can crush large rocks into small pieces.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງຈັກສາມາດຂັດຫີນຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່ເປັນຕ່ອນນ້ອຍໆ.

meaning list.meaning: Crystal (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She admired the delicate crystal vase on the table.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊົມເຊີຍ vase ໄປເຊຍກັນທີ່ອ່ອນໂຍນຢູ່ເທິງໂຕະ.

meaning list.meaning: ນິກາຍ, ນິກາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The group was accused of operating as a dangerous cult.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຸ່ມ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຖືກ​ກ່າວ​ຫາ​ວ່າ​ປະຕິບັດ​ງານ​ເປັນ​ສາສະໜາ​ທີ່​ອັນຕະລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກາຍ​ເປັນ cult (ຄຸນ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The movie has a cult following despite its age.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີອາຍຸຂອງມັນ, ຮູບເງົາມີ cult ປະຕິບັດຕາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປູກຝັງ, ພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: Farmers cultivate the land to grow crops.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວກະສິກອນປູກຝັງດິນເພື່ອປູກພືດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຢາກຮູ້ຢາກເຫັນ, ຄວາມສົນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: Her curiosity led her to explore the old mansion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມ​ຢາກ​ຮູ້​ຢາກ​ເຫັນ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ພາ​ລາວ​ໄປ​ຄົ້ນ​ຫາ​ເຮືອນ​ຫລັງ​ເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸ້ມຄອງ, ຄຸ້ມຄອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The suspect was taken into police custody.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ຕ້ອງ​ສົງ​ໄສ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ຈັບ​ຕົວ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ໃນ​ການ​ຄວບ​ຄຸມ​ຂອງ​ຕຳຫຼວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸ້ມຄອງດູແລ
meaning list.sentence: She won custody of her children after the divorce.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ຢ່າ​ຮ້າງ​, ນາງ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ດູ​ແລ​ຂອງ​ລູກ​ຂອງ​ນາງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ, ຕັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The gardener made precise cuttings of the hedge.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນສວນເຮັດການຕັດຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງສໍາລັບ hedge.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໄສ, ຂີ້ຄ້ານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a cynical attitude towards politics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີທັດສະນະຄະຕິຕໍ່ການເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂື່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The dam was built to control the river's flow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂື່ອນດັ່ງກ່າວຖືກສ້າງຂຶ້ນເພື່ອຄວບຄຸມການໄຫຼຂອງນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນອັນຕະລາຍ, ທໍາລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The report revealed the damaging effects of pollution.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານໄດ້ເປີດເຜີຍຜົນກະທົບອັນຕະລາຍຂອງມົນລະພິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາລຸນ, ອາລຸນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We woke up early to watch the dawn.

meaning list.meaning: Debris, debris (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rescue team searched through the debris for survivors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໜ່ວຍກູ້ໄພໄດ້ຊອກຫາຜູ້ລອດຊີວິດຢູ່ໃນຊາກຫັກພັງ.

meaning list.meaning: debut, debut (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The singer's debut album became an instant hit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັນລະບັ້ມ debut ຂອງນັກຮ້ອງໄດ້ກາຍເປັນ hit ທັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຳນົດ, ຕັດສິນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ປະກາດ, ປະກາດ (ຄຳນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ອຸທິດຕົນ, ອຸທິດຕົນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She is dedicated to improving education in rural areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມຸ່ງ​ໄປ​ເຖິງ​ການ​ປັບ​ປຸງ​ການ​ສຶກ​ສາ​ຢູ່​ເຂດ​ຊົນ​ນະ​ບົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸທິດຕົນ, ອຸທິດຕົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His dedication to his work is truly inspiring.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອຸທິດຕົນຕໍ່ວຽກຂອງລາວແມ່ນເປັນແຮງບັນດານໃຈແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກະທຳ, ພຶດຕິກຳ
meaning list.sentence: His brave deed saved the lives of many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກະ ທຳ ທີ່ກ້າຫານຂອງລາວໄດ້ຊ່ວຍຊີວິດຂອງຫຼາຍຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັບ, ຄິດ (verb)

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ, ຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ຂໍ້ບົກພ່ອງ, ຄວາມບໍ່ເປັນລະບຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car was recalled due to a manufacturing defect.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງກັນ, ປ້ອງກັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The team focused on a strong defensive strategy.

meaning list.meaning: ຂາດ, ບໍ່ພຽງພໍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Vitamin D deficiency can cause health problems.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂາດວິຕາມິນ D ສາມາດນໍາໄປສູ່ບັນຫາສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂາດດຸນງົບປະມານ, ການຂາດດຸນງົບປະມານ
meaning list.sentence: The government is working to reduce the budget deficit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານກໍາລັງເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການຂາດດຸນງົບປະມານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດຄ້ານ, ທ້າທາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The protesters defied the curfew and marched in the streets.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ຂະ​ບວນ​ຢູ່​ຕາມ​ຖະ​ໜົນ​ຫົນ​ທາງ, ຕ້ານ​ການ​ຫ້າມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວແທນ, ຕົວແທນ
meaning list.sentence: The delegate attended the international conference.

meaning list.meaning: ຄະນະຜູ້ແທນ, ກຸ່ມຜູ້ແທນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The delegation discussed trade agreements with the host country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະ​ຜູ້​ແທນ​ໄດ້​ປຶກສາ​ຫາລື​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ສັນຍາ​ການ​ຄ້າ​ກັບ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເຈົ້າພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະອຽດອ່ອນ, ລະອຽດອ່ອນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The glass vase is very delicate and must be handled with care.
meaning list.sentence translation: vase ແກ້ວຄວນໄດ້ຮັບການປະຕິບັດຫຼາຍລະອຽດອ່ອນແລະລະມັດລະວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາຕານ, ວິນຍານຊົ່ວ
meaning list.sentence: In folklore, demons are often depicted as evil creatures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນນິທານພື້ນເມືອງ, ຜີປີສາດມັກຈະຖືກພັນລະນາວ່າເປັນສັດຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ, ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: The company issued a denial of the allegations.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວໂທດ, ປະນາມ
meaning list.sentence: The politician denounced corruption in the government.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸມ, ເລື້ອຍໆ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The forest was so dense that it was hard to walk through.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ່າໄມ້ດົກໜາຫຼາຍ ຍ່າງຜ່ານມັນຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂຸ້ນ, ຄວາມຖີ່ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິບາຍ, ອະທິບາຍ

meaning list.meaning: ນຳໃຊ້ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍ, ຮອງ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ສືບເຊື້ອສາຍ, ສືບເຊື້ອສາຍ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ການແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ, ກໍານົດ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ອງການ, ຕ້ອງການ (ຄຸນນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ຄອມພິວເຕີຕັ້ງໂຕະ (ນາມ)

meaning list.meaning: ທໍາລາຍ, ທໍາລາຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The hurricane had destructive effects on the coastal towns.

meaning list.meaning: ກັກຂັງ, ກັກຂັງ
meaning list.sentence: The police detained the suspect for questioning.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ກວດ​ສອບ​, ການ​ຮັບ​ຮູ້ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: Early detection of the disease can save lives.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກວດພົບພະຍາດເບື້ອງຕົ້ນສາມາດຊ່ວຍປະຢັດຊີວິດໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການກັກຂັງ, ການກັກຂັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The journalist faced detention for his controversial articles.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ຂ່າວ​ຄົນ​ນີ້​ຖືກ​ກັກ​ຂັງ​ຍ້ອນ​ບົດ​ຄວາມ​ທີ່​ຂັດ​ແຍ້​ງກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊື່ອມໂຊມ, ຫຍໍ້ທໍ້

meaning list.meaning: ທຳລາຍ, ທຳລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The earthquake devastated the entire region.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາຕານ, ວິນຍານຊົ່ວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: In many religions, the devil is seen as the personification of evil.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກແບບ, ປະດິດ
meaning list.sentence: They devised a new plan to solve the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ວາງແຜນໃຫມ່ເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົ່ງມະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: The doctor diagnosed him with a rare illness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ ໝໍ ໄດ້ກວດຫາລາວວ່າເປັນພະຍາດທີ່ຫາຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການວິນິດໄສ

meaning list.meaning: dictate, ຊີ້ບອກ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The teacher dictated the answers to the class.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄູໄດ້ກໍານົດຄໍາຕອບໃຫ້ຫ້ອງຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: dictator (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dictator ruled the country with an iron fist.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ປົກຄອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ດ້ວຍ​ກຳປັ້ນ​ເຫຼັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ເຂົ້າໃຈຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: It’s important to differentiate fact from opinion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະຈໍາແນກຄວາມເປັນຈິງຈາກຄວາມຄິດເຫັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຽດສັກສີ, ກຽດສັກສີ
meaning list.sentence: He faced his challenges with courage and dignity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ໜ້າ​ກັບ​ການ​ທ້າ​ທາຍ​ດ້ວຍ​ຄວາມ​ກ້າ​ຫານ ແລະ​ກຽດ​ສັກ​ສີ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາວະວິກິດ
meaning list.sentence: She faced a dilemma about whether to stay or leave.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ປະ​ເຊີນ​ໜ້າ​ກັບ​ຄວາມ​ຫຍຸ້ງ​ຍາກ​ບໍ່​ວ່າ​ຈະ​ຢູ່​ຫຼື​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະໜາດ, ຂອບເຂດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The problem has a political and social dimension.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນຫາມີຂະຫນາດທາງດ້ານການເມືອງແລະສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຼຸດ, ຫຼຸດ
meaning list.sentence: The medicine helped to diminish the pain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຢາໄດ້ຊ່ວຍຫຼຸດຜ່ອນຄວາມເຈັບປວດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົມ, ຈົມລົງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She dipped her hand into the water to check the temperature.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈຸ່ມມືເຂົ້າໄປໃນນ້ໍາເພື່ອກວດເບິ່ງອຸນຫະພູມຂອງນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກການທູດ
meaning list.sentence: The diplomat worked to negotiate a peace treaty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກການທູດເຮັດວຽກເພື່ອເຈລະຈາສັນຍາສັນຕິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທູດ, ສຸພາບ
meaning list.sentence: He handled the situation in a very diplomatic way.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈັດການສະຖານະການທາງການທູດຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: Directory, directory (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The directory lists all the company’s employees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຍຊື່ພະນັກງານທັງໝົດຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄພພິບັດ, ຮ້າຍກາດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The flood had disastrous consequences for the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນ້ຳ​ຖ້ວມ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ເສຍ​ຫາຍ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ຊຸມ​ຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: Please discard the old newspapers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາຖິ້ມຫນັງສືພິມເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ອົບພະຍົບ
meaning list.sentence: The hospital discharged the patient after a week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງ ໝໍ ໄດ້ປ່ອຍຄົນເຈັບໃນອາທິດຕໍ່ມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິບາຍ, ເປີດເຜີຍ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company disclosed its annual financial report.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະກາດບົດລາຍງານການເງິນປະຈໍາປີຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາອະທິບາຍ, ເປີດເຜີຍ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The disclosure of the secret deal caused controversy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ເປີດ​ເຜີຍ​ຂໍ້​ຕົກລົງ​ລັບ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ຂັດ​ແຍ້​ງກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳເວົ້າ, ຄຳເວົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The professor’s discourse on history was enlightening.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົນທະນາຂອງສາດສະດາຈານກ່ຽວກັບປະຫວັດສາດແມ່ນມີຄວາມສະຫວ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕັດສິນໃຈ, ສະຕິປັນຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: You can leave early at your own discretion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າ​ອາດ​ອອກ​ໄປ​ໄວ​ຕາມ​ຄວາມ​ຕັດສິນ​ໃຈ​ຂອງ​ເຈົ້າ​ເອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈໍາແນກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The law prohibits discrimination based on race or gender.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດໝາຍຫ້າມການຈຳແນກບົນພື້ນຖານເຊື້ອຊາດ ຫຼືເພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຟ, ການໄລ່ອອກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His unfair dismissal led to a legal dispute.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຍົກ​ຟ້ອງ​ທີ່​ບໍ່​ຍຸ​ຕິ​ທຳ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໄດ້​ພາ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ຂໍ້​ຂັດ​ແຍ່ງ​ທາງ​ກົດ​ໝາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: to displace, to displace (ຄຳ​ກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The construction of the dam displaced thousands of people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ກໍ່​ສ້າງ​ເຂື່ອນ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ປະ​ຊາ​ຊົນ​ນັບ​ພັນ​ຄົນ​ຕ້ອງ​ອົບ​ພະ​ຍົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທໍາລາຍ, ການກໍາຈັດ
meaning list.sentence: Proper disposal of waste is essential for the environment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກໍາຈັດສິ່ງເສດເຫຼືອທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງແມ່ນມີຄວາມຈໍາເປັນສໍາລັບສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He disposed of the old furniture before moving.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ່ອນທີ່ຈະເຄື່ອນຍ້າຍ, ນາງໄດ້ຖິ້ມເຄື່ອງເຟີນີເຈີເກົ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມບໍ່ເຫັນດີ, ຄວາມຂັດແຍ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dispute between the two companies lasted for years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຂັດແຍ້ງລະຫວ່າງສອງບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສືບຕໍ່ມາເປັນເວລາຫລາຍປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຕ້ແຍ້ງ, ຄັດຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: They disputed the results of the election.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າຄັດຄ້ານຜົນການເລືອກຕັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບກວນ, ລົບກວນ
meaning list.sentence: The strike disrupted public transportation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະທ້ວງໄດ້ຂັດຂວາງການຂົນສົ່ງສາທາລະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂັດຂວາງ, ການຂັດຂວາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bad weather caused a disruption in the power supply.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາບອາກາດທີ່ບໍ່ດີເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດການຂັດຂວາງການສະຫນອງໄຟຟ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດໃຫ້ລະລາຍ, ການລະລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The sugar dissolved quickly in the hot tea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ້ໍາຕານລະລາຍຢ່າງໄວວາໃນຊາຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງ, ຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: There is a clear distinction between the two concepts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງທີ່ຊັດເຈນລະຫວ່າງສອງແນວຄວາມຄິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດເດັ່ນ, ໂດດເດັ່ນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The artist has a very distinctive style.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈິດຕະນາການມີຮູບແບບທີ່ເປັນເອກະລັກຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ບິດເບືອນ, ບິດເບືອນ
meaning list.sentence: The lens distorted the image slightly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລນບິດເບືອນຮູບພາບເລັກນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໂສກເສົ້າ, ຄວາມໂສກເສົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The news caused her great distress.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ລາວ​ໂສກ​ເສົ້າ​ຢ່າງ​ໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ວຸ້ນວາຍ, ລຳບາກ
meaning list.sentence: The loud noise distressed the animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສຽງດັງໄດ້ລົບກວນສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບກວນ, ຄວາມບໍ່ສະຫງົບ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The disturbing images in the film upset many viewers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບພາບທີ່ລົບກວນໃນຮູບເງົາເຮັດໃຫ້ຜູ້ຊົມຫລາຍຄົນຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອປ່ຽນເສັ້ນທາງ, ເພື່ອຫັນປ່ຽນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The traffic was diverted due to road construction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາບຈະລາຈອນຖືກຫັນລົງຍ້ອນການສັນຈອນທາງບົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັນສັກສິດ, ສັກສິດ
meaning list.sentence: The artwork was inspired by divine themes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານສິລະປະໄດ້ຮັບການດົນໃຈຈາກຫົວຂໍ້ອັນສູງສົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຳສອນ, ຄຳສອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The political doctrine influenced many governments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາສອນທາງດ້ານການເມືອງມີອິດທິພົນຕໍ່ລັດຖະບານຈໍານວນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອກະສານ, ເອກະສານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project requires thorough documentation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການຕ້ອງການເອກະສານຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາກສະຫນາມ, ພາກສະຫນາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist is an expert in the domain of genetics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດເປັນຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານໃນດ້ານພັນທຸກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດັ່ນ, ເໜືອກວ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company established its dominance in the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສ້າງຕັ້ງການເດັ່ນຂອງຕົນໃນຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: donor, donor (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hospital is looking for blood donors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງໝໍກຳລັງຊອກຫາຜູ້ບໍລິຈາກເລືອດ.

meaning list.meaning: Dose, ຈຳນວນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor prescribed a high dose of antibiotics.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍສັ່ງຢາຕ້ານເຊື້ອໃນປະລິມານສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບາຍນ້ຳ
meaning list.sentence: The plumber drained the water from the sink.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊ່າງ​ປະ​ປາ​ໄດ້​ລະບາຍ​ນ້ຳ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ບ່ອນ​ຫລົ້ມ​ຈົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ລອຍ
meaning list.sentence: The boat drifted away from the shore.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອ​ໄດ້​ຍ້າຍ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ຝັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຮງຈູງໃຈ, ແຮງຈູງໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Her passion for innovation is the driving force behind her success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກະຕືລືລົ້ນຂອງລາວສໍາລັບການປະດິດສ້າງແມ່ນກໍາລັງຂັບເຄື່ອນຂອງຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົມນ້ຳ, ຫາຍໃຈຍາກ
meaning list.sentence: He tried to save the child who was drowning in the river.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ພະຍາຍາມ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ​ເດັກ​ຊາຍ​ທີ່​ຈົມ​ນ້ຳ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ແມ່ນ້ຳ.

meaning list.meaning: double, double (ຄຳ ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car has a dual air conditioning system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດມີລະບົບປັບອາກາດຄູ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງຊື່, ແປ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The actor was dubbed as the new action hero.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງໄດ້ຖືກເອີ້ນວ່າ hero ການປະຕິບັດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ງຽບ, ໂງ່
meaning list.sentence: He remained dumb during the entire meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມິດງຽບຕະຫຼອດການປະຊຸມທັງໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: double, double (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The musical duo performed beautifully on stage.
meaning list.sentence translation: duo ດົນຕີໄດ້ສະແດງທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ຢູ່ໃນເວທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອນໄຫວ, ໂຄງສ້າງເຄື່ອນທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The group dynamic was crucial for the project's success.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວຂອງກຸ່ມແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ກັບຄວາມສໍາເລັດຂອງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕືລືລົ້ນ, ເຕັມໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She was eager to start her new job.
