meaning list.sentence: The modification to the design improved its efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນແປງໃນການອອກແບບໄດ້ເພີ່ມປະສິດທິພາບຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໄວ, ຄວາມເລັ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The project gained momentum after securing additional funding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງ​ການ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຜົນ​ກະ​ທົບ​ຢ່າງ​ວ່ອງ​ໄວ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ເງິນ​ເພີ່ມ​ເຕີມ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ປະ​ກັນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ພະສົງ, ບວດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The monk spent years meditating in the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະສົງໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍປີນັ່ງສະມາທິຢູ່ໃນພູເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູກຂາດ, ຜູກຂາດ
meaning list.sentence: The company was accused of having a monopoly on the market.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຖືກກ່າວຫາວ່າມີການຜູກຂາດໃນຕະຫຼາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບັດສິນ, ຄຸນຄ່າທາງດ້ານຈັນຍາບັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The novel explores themes of morality and justice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະວະນິຍາຍຄົ້ນຄວ້າຫົວຂໍ້ກ່ຽວກັບສິນທຳ ແລະ ຄວາມຍຸດຕິທຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈູງໃຈ, ຈຸດປະສົງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police are investigating the motive behind the crime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ພວມ​ສືບ​ສວນ​ຫາ​ສາ​ເຫດ​ທີ່​ຢູ່​ເບື້ອງ​ຫລັງ​ການ​ກໍ່​ອາ​ຊະ​ຍາ​ກຳ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນຂັບລົດ, ຄົນຂັບລົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The motorist stopped to help the stranded driver.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄົນຂັບລົດໄດ້ຢຸດເພື່ອຊ່ວຍຄົນຂັບລົດທີ່ຕິດຄ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທດສະບານ, ຕົວເມືອງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The municipal government announced new regulations for waste management.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ເທດ​ສະ​ບານ​ປະ​ກາດ​ລະ​ບຽບ​ການ​ໃຫມ່​ໃນ​ການ​ຄຸ້ມ​ຄອງ​ສິ່ງ​ເສດ​ເຫຼືອ​.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊິ່ງກັນແລະກັນ, ເຊິ່ງກັນແລະກັນ
meaning list.sentence: Their relationship is based on mutual respect.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາຍພົວພັນຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ການເຄົາລົບເຊິ່ງກັນແລະກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ເຊັ່ນ: ຄໍາກິລິຍາ
meaning list.sentence: Only one person, namely John, failed the exam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີພຽງແຕ່ຄົນດຽວ, ຄື John, ລົ້ມເຫລວໃນການສອບເສັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົ່ວປະເທດ
meaning list.sentence: The new policy will be implemented nationwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ຈະ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ການ​ປະຕິບັດ​ໃນ​ທົ່ວ​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກອງທັບເຮືອ
meaning list.sentence: The naval forces conducted a large-scale exercise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳລັງກອງທັບເຮືອ ໄດ້ທຳການຊ້ອມລົບຂະໜາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເລີຍ
meaning list.sentence: He neglected his responsibilities at work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລະເລີຍຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບຂອງລາວໃນການເຮັດວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະເລີຍ, ການລະເລີຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The building fell into disrepair due to years of neglect.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເນື່ອງຈາກການລະເລີຍຫຼາຍປີ, ອາຄານໄດ້ຕົກຢູ່ໃນສະພາບເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອນບ້ານ, ໃກ້ຄຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The neighbouring countries signed a trade agreement.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດເພື່ອນບ້ານໄດ້ລົງນາມໃນສັນຍາການຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bird built a nest in the tree.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກເຂົາສ້າງຮັງຢູ່ໃນຕົ້ນໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັດເຈນ, ບໍລິສຸດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company reported a net profit of $1 million.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ລາຍງານກໍາໄລສຸດທິ 1 ລ້ານໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈົດໝາຍຂ່າວ
meaning list.sentence: The organization sends a monthly newsletter to its members.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງສົ່ງຈົດຫມາຍຂ່າວປະຈໍາເດືອນໃຫ້ສະມາຊິກຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຂດພິເສດ, ສະເພາະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She found her niche in graphic design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພົບເຫັນ niche ລາວໃນການອອກແບບກາຟິກ.

meaning list.meaning: Noble, noble (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He comes from a noble family with a long history.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມາຈາກຄອບຄົວທີ່ສູງສົ່ງທີ່ມີປະຫວັດສາດອັນຍາວນານ.

meaning list.meaning: nod
meaning list.sentence: She nodded in agreement with the proposal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຫົວ​ຫົວ, ຍອມຮັບ​ຂໍ້​ສະ​ເໜີ.

meaning list.meaning: ນາມ
meaning list.sentence: He was nominated for the best actor award.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກແຕ່ງຕັ້ງໃຫ້ໄດ້ຮັບລາງວັນນັກສະແດງທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຕ່ງຕັ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her nomination for the position was well-deserved.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສະໝັກ​ຮັບ​ເລືອກ​ຕັ້ງ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ແມ່ນ​ສົມຄວນ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ຢ່າງ​ເຕັມທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: The nominee received strong support from the public.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ສະຫມັກໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍຈາກປະຊາຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງໃດກໍຕາມ, ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The project faced challenges; nonetheless, it was completed on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການແລ່ນເຂົ້າໄປໃນຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ; ແຕ່ມັນໄດ້ຖືກສໍາເລັດຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຫວັງຜົນກຳໄລ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization operates as a non-profit entity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງດໍາເນີນການເປັນອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງທີ່ບໍ່ຫວັງຜົນກໍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຮ້ສາລະ, ສິ່ງທີ່ບໍ່ມີຄວາມຫມາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: What you said is complete nonsense.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິ່ງທີ່ທ່ານເວົ້າແມ່ນບໍ່ມີເຫດຜົນຄົບຖ້ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ່ຽງ, ທ່ຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The meeting is scheduled for noon tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງປະຊຸມຈະໄດ້ຈັດຂຶ້ນໃນມື້ອື່ນຕອນທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຈ້ງ, ແຈ້ງ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: Please notify us if you change your address.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະລຸນາບອກໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາຮູ້ຖ້າທ່ານປ່ຽນທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງທ່ານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃໝ່, ຕົ້ນສະບັບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist introduced a novel approach to the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີວິທີການໃຫມ່ຂອງບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສວນກ້າ, ສວນກ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She left her child at the nursery before going to work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງ​ໄດ້​ເອົາ​ລູກ​ໄປ​ໂຮງ​ລ້ຽງ​ເດັກ​ກ່ອນ​ໄປ​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດຄ້ານ, ຄັດຄ້ານ
meaning list.sentence: The lawyer raised an objection during the trial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຍຄວາມໄດ້ຄັດຄ້ານໃນລະຫວ່າງການໄຕ່ສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: to oblige, to oblige (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The law obliges companies to pay their taxes on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກົດຫມາຍບັງຄັບໃຫ້ບໍລິສັດຈ່າຍພາສີຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າທັນເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເມົາມົວ
meaning list.sentence: He obsesses over every detail of his work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນ obsessive ກ່ຽວກັບລາຍລະອຽດຂອງວຽກເຮັດງານທໍາລາວທຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: Obsession, fixation (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her obsession with cleanliness is exhausting.
meaning list.sentence translation: Obsession ກັບຄວາມສະອາດແມ່ນເມື່ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງຄັ້ງ, ບໍ່ຄ່ອຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: He makes occasional visits to his hometown.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມບ້ານເກີດຂອງລາວເປັນບາງໂອກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫດການ, ການປະກົດຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: Such occurrences are rare in this area.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການດັ່ງກ່າວບໍ່ຄ່ອຍເກີດຂຶ້ນໃນພາກພື້ນນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້, ໂອກາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The odds of winning the lottery are very slim.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ຂອງການຊະນະຫວຍແມ່ນຕໍ່າຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໜີ, ສະເໜີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company’s latest offering is a new smartphone model.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສະເຫນີຂາຍຫລ້າສຸດຂອງບໍລິສັດແມ່ນຮູບແບບໂທລະສັບສະຫຼາດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ລູກຫລານ, ເດັກນ້ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bird fed its offspring with worms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກຊະນິດນີ້ໃຫ້ອາຫານແມ່ທ້ອງຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນການປະຕິບັດ, ການປະຕິບັດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new factory is now fully operational.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຈຸບັນໂຮງງານແຫ່ງໃໝ່ໄດ້ເປີດໃຫ້ບໍລິການແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລືອກ, ເລືອກ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She opted to stay home instead of going to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກຢູ່ເຮືອນແທນທີ່ຈະໄປງານລ້ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: optical, ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບວິໄສທັດ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The optical zoom on the camera allows for detailed shots.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຸນສົມບັດການຊູມ optical ຂອງກ້ອງຖ່າຍຮູບສະຫນອງການຖ່າຍຮູບລາຍລະອຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: optimism (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her optimism about the future inspired others.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມເຫັນແກ່ຕົວຂອງລາວກ່ຽວກັບອະນາຄົດໄດ້ດົນໃຈຄົນອື່ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາກ, ກ່ຽວກັບປາກ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The exam includes both written and oral components.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສອບເສັງລວມມີທັງພາກຂຽນ ແລະ ພາກປາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດຕັ້ງ, ໂຄງສ້າງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organizational changes improved the company’s efficiency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປ່ຽນແປງອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງໄດ້ເພີ່ມປະສິດທິພາບຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຖົມນິເທດ
meaning list.sentence: New employees undergo a week-long orientation program.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະນັກງານໃຫມ່ຜ່ານໂຄງການປະຖົມນິເທດໃນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີດຂື້ນ, ເກີດຂື້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The tradition originated in ancient Greece.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເພນີນີ້ມີຕົ້ນກຳເນີດມາຈາກປະເທດເກຣັກບູຮານ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະບາດ, ການລະບາດ
meaning list.sentence: The outbreak of the flu affected thousands of people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລະບາດຂອງໄຂ້ຫວັດໃຫຍ່ໄດ້ສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ປະຊາຊົນຫຼາຍພັນຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເດີນທາງ, ການທ່ອງທ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: We went on a family outing to the beach.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຮົາ​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ທາງ​ກັບ​ຄອບ​ຄົວ​ໄປ​ຫາດ​ຊາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂາອອກ, ຈຸດຂາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This store is an outlet for discounted items.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານນີ້ແມ່ນຮ້ານຂາຍຍ່ອຍສໍາລັບລາຍການຫຼຸດລາຄາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທັດສະນະ, ທັດສະນະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She has a positive outlook on life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີທັດສະນະໃນທາງບວກກ່ຽວກັບຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໃຈຮ້າຍ, ການດູຖູກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The decision caused public outrage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ຄວາມ​ໂກດ​ແຄ້ນ​ຂອງ​ສາ​ທາ​ລະ​ນະ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຈຮ້າຍ, ໃຈຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The comments outraged many viewers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ເຫັນ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ຜູ້​ຊົມ​ຫລາຍ​ຄົນ​ຄຽດ​ແຄ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນນອກ, ຄົນແປກໜ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: As an outsider, he found it difficult to fit in.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມຍາກລໍາບາກທີ່ຈະເຫມາະກັບຄົນພາຍນອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ສົນໃຈ, ignore (verb)
meaning list.sentence: They overlooked some important details in the report.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າບໍ່ສົນໃຈບາງລາຍລະອຽດທີ່ສໍາຄັນຂອງບົດລາຍງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີນ, ເກີນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She was overly critical of the new policy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຕີ​ລາຄາ​ສູງ​ຕໍ່​ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວບຄຸມ, ຈັດການ
meaning list.sentence: He was hired to oversee the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈ້າງສໍາລັບການຄຸ້ມຄອງໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄ່ນລົ້ມ, ໂຄ່ນລົ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: The car overturned on the slippery road.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລົດ​ໄດ້​ເສຍ​ຫຼັກ​ເສຍ​ຊີວິດ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ເສັ້ນທາງ​ທີ່​រអិល.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ນ, ບີບບັງຄັບ
meaning list.sentence: The overwhelming workload left her exhausted.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວຽກງານອັນໜັກໜ່ວງເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວໝົດແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົ້ນ, ລົ້ນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The support for the campaign was overwhelming.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສະ​ຫນັບ​ສະ​ຫນູນ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ​ໂຄ​ສະ​ນາ​ແມ່ນ overwhelming.

meaning list.meaning: ໝອນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He wrote his notes on a writing pad.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂຽນບັນທຶກຂອງລາວໃສ່ແຜ່ນຂຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພາລາມິເຕີ, ເງື່ອນໄຂ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The study defined specific parameters for the research.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາໄດ້ກໍານົດຕົວກໍານົດການສະເພາະໃດຫນຶ່ງສໍາລັບການຄົ້ນຄ້ວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ພໍ່​ແມ່ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: Parental guidance is recommended for this movie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳແນະນຳຂອງພໍ່ແມ່ແມ່ນແນະນຳສຳລັບຮູບເງົາເລື່ອງນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: parish (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The parish gathered for the Sunday service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຊາຄົມມາເຕົ້າໂຮມກັນເພື່ອຮັບໃຊ້ວັນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລັດຖະສະພາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The parliamentary debate lasted for hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ໂຕ້​ວາທີ​ຂອງ​ລັດຖະສະພາ​ໄດ້​ແກ່ຍາວ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ຫຼາຍ​ຊົ່ວ​ໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງສ່ວນ, ບໍ່ຄົບຖ້ວນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The building sustained partial damage during the storm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍບາງສ່ວນໃນລະຫວ່າງການພະຍຸ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາງສ່ວນ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The plan was partially successful.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜນການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດບາງສ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຫັນປ່ຽນ, ຄວາມຕາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her passing was a great loss to the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເສຍຊີວິດຂອງລາວເປັນການສູນເສຍອັນໃຫຍ່ຫຼວງຕໍ່ສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: Passive (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She took a passive role in the negotiations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ມີບົດບາດຕົວຕັ້ງຕົວຕີໃນການເຈລະຈາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິດຍາພິບານ, ປະໂລຫິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The pastor delivered a powerful sermon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິດຍາພິບານໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາເທດສະຫນາທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊິ້ນສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He wore a jacket with a leather patch on the elbow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໃສ່​ເສື້ອ​ກັນ​ໜາວ​ທີ່​ມີ​ແຜ່ນ​ໜັງ​ຢູ່​ສອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິດທິບັດ, ການລົງທະບຽນປະດິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The inventor applied for a patent for his new device.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ປະດິດໄດ້ຮ້ອງຂໍສິດທິບັດສໍາລັບອຸປະກອນໃຫມ່ຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນທາງ, ເສັ້ນທາງ
meaning list.sentence: The garden features a winding pathway through the trees.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີເສັ້ນທາງທີ່ winding ຜ່ານຕົ້ນໄມ້ໃນສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາດຕະເວນ, ລາດຕະເວນ (ຄຳນາມ, ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The security team patrols the building every night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານຮັກສາຄວາມປອດໄພໄດ້ລາດຕະເວນອາຄານທຸກຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປົກປ້ອງ, ລູກຄ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum is supported by many generous patrons.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຈາກຜູ້ອຸປະຖໍາໃຈກວ້າງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸດຍອດ, ສຸດຍອດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The athlete reached the peak of his career last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກກິລາໄດ້ບັນລຸຈຸດສູງສຸດຂອງການເຮັດວຽກຂອງລາວໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາວນາ
meaning list.sentence: The peasants worked hard to harvest their crops.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວບ້ານເຮັດວຽກໜັກເພື່ອເກັບກ່ຽວຜົນລະປູກ.

meaning list.meaning: ແປກ, ແປກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: There’s something peculiar about his behavior today.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີບາງສິ່ງບາງຢ່າງທີ່ແປກປະຫຼາດກ່ຽວກັບພຶດຕິກໍາຂອງລາວໃນມື້ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຍືນຍັນ, ຄົງຕົວ
meaning list.sentence: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖ້າອາການຍັງຄົງຢູ່, ໃຫ້ປຶກສາແພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົງທີ່, ຄົງທີ່ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: Her persistent efforts eventually paid off.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມຄົງທີ່ຂອງລາວໃນທີ່ສຸດກໍ່ໄດ້ຮັບຜົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະນັກງານ, ພະນັກງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is hiring new personnel for its office.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງຈ້າງພະນັກງານໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບຫ້ອງການຂອງຕົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ຮ້ອງ​ສະ​ຫມັກ (ຄໍາ​ຮ້ອງ​ສະ​ຫມັກ​)
meaning list.sentence: They submitted a petition to improve the road conditions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຍື່ນຄໍາຮ້ອງຟ້ອງເພື່ອປັບປຸງສະພາບເສັ້ນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກປັດຊະຍາ, ນັກຄິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Socrates is considered one of the greatest philosophers in history.
meaning list.sentence translation: Socrates ຖືກຖືວ່າເປັນນັກປັດຊະຍາທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ທີ່ສຸດໃນປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: philosophical, intellectual (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She enjoys discussing philosophical questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມັກສົນທະນາຄໍາຖາມ philosophical.

meaning list.meaning: ໝໍ, ໝໍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The physician prescribed antibiotics for the infection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍສັ່ງຢາຕ້ານເຊື້ອສໍາລັບການຕິດເຊື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ບຸກເບີກ
meaning list.sentence: She is a pioneer in the field of environmental science.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ບຸກເບີກໃນຂົງເຂດວິທະຍາສາດສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ນໍາພາ
meaning list.sentence: The company pioneered the use of renewable energy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ບຸກເບີກການນໍາໃຊ້ພະລັງງານທົດແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທໍ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The oil pipeline runs across the desert.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທໍ່ນໍ້າມັນໄດ້ຢຽດຂ້າມທະເລຊາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຈນສະລັດ
meaning list.sentence: The ship was attacked by pirates near the coast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກໂຈມຕີໂດຍໂຈນສະຫລັດຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບຊາຍຝັ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຸມ, ດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He fell into a deep pit while hiking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຂະນະທີ່ຍ່າງ, ລາວຕົກລົງເຂົ້າໄປໃນຂຸມເລິກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດຄ້ານ, ປ້ອງກັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prisoner made a plea for mercy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກໂທດໄດ້ອ້ອນວອນຂໍຄວາມເມດຕາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງທຸກ, ຮ້ອງທຸກ
meaning list.sentence: He pleaded not guilty to the charges.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຂໍຮ້ອງວ່າບໍ່ມີຄວາມຜິດຕໍ່ຂໍ້ກ່າວຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາ​ຫມັ້ນ​ສັນ​ຍາ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The government made a pledge to reduce emissions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານໄດ້ສັນຍາວ່າຈະຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການປ່ອຍອາຍພິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາ, ສັນຍາ
meaning list.sentence: The company pledged to support renewable energy initiatives.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄໍາຫມັ້ນສັນຍາທີ່ຈະສະຫນັບສະຫນູນການລິເລີ່ມພະລັງງານທົດແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຽບ, ສຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He pulled the plug to turn off the device.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວດຶງສຽບເພື່ອປິດອຸປະກອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຽບ, ອຸດຕັນ
meaning list.sentence: She plugged the charger into the socket.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສຽບສາຍສາກເຂົ້າໄປໃນເຕົ້າສຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊົາໄວ
meaning list.sentence: The stock market plunged after the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕະຫຼາດຫຼັກຊັບຫຼຸດລົງຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍຫຼັງຈາກຂ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສົາ, ເສົາ
meaning list.sentence: They set up a pole to hold the tent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາ ຕັ້ງ ເສົາ ເພື່ອ ຕັ້ງ ຜ້າເຕັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການນັບຄະແນນສຽງ, ການນັບຄະແນນສຽງ
meaning list.sentence: The poll shows a close race between the candidates.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຢັ່ງ​ຫາງ​ສຽງ​ສະ​ແດງ​ໃຫ້​ເຫັນ​ການ​ແຂ່ງ​ຂັນ​ທີ່​ໃກ້​ຊິດ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ຜູ້​ສະ​ໝັກ​ຮັບ​ເລືອກ​ຕັ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໜອງ, ນ້ຳນ້ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ducks were swimming in the pond.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປັດໄດ້ລອຍຢູ່ໃນຫນອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເບີດ, ປະກົດຂຶ້ນຢ່າງກະທັນຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: The balloon popped loudly and startled everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປູມເປົ້າແຕກຂຶ້ນດ້ວຍສຽງດັງ ແລະເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນຕື່ນຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: Portfolio, ກະເປົ໋າຫຍໍ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She presented her design portfolio to the client.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີຫຼັກຊັບການອອກແບບຂອງລາວໃຫ້ກັບລູກຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົ່ງບອກ, ບັນຍາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The actor portrays a detective in the movie.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງເປັນນັກສືບໃນຮູບເງົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລື່ອນ
meaning list.sentence: The meeting was postponed due to bad weather.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງ​ປະ​ຊຸມ​ໄດ້​ເລື່ອນ​ເວ​ລາ​ເນື່ອງ​ຈາກ​ສະ​ພາບ​ອາ​ກາດ​ບໍ່​ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫລັງສົງຄາມ
meaning list.sentence: The country faced economic challenges in the post-war era.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະ​ເທດ​ນີ້​ປະສົບ​ກັບ​ຄວາມ​ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ​ດ້ານ​ເສດຖະກິດ​ໃນ​ໄລຍະ​ຫຼັງ​ສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປະຕິບັດ, ຜູ້ປະຕິບັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is a practitioner of traditional medicine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ປະຕິບັດການຢາພື້ນເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທດສະໜາ, ຕັກເຕືອນ
meaning list.sentence: The priest preached about forgiveness during the service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະໂລຫິດໄດ້ສອນກ່ຽວກັບການໃຫ້ອະໄພໃນລະຫວ່າງການຮັບໃຊ້.

meaning list.meaning: ກໍລະນີສຶກສາ, precedent (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This case sets an important legal precedent.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກໍ​ລະ​ນີ​ນີ້​ກໍາ​ນົດ​ແບບ​ຢ່າງ​ທາງ​ດ້ານ​ກົດ​ຫມາຍ​ທີ່​ສໍາ​ຄັນ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມແມ່ນຍໍາ, ຄວາມແມ່ນຍໍາ
meaning list.sentence: The precision of the instrument ensures accurate measurements.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວຂອງເຄື່ອງມືຮັບປະກັນການວັດແທກທີ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ລ່າ, ລ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Lions are apex predators in their environment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິງໂຕເປັນສັດລ້າສຸດໃນສະພາບແວດລ້ອມຂອງພວກມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ອນໜ້າ, ກ່ອນໜ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new manager learned a lot from his predecessor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຈັດການໃຫມ່ໄດ້ຮຽນຮູ້ຫຼາຍຢ່າງຈາກຜູ້ກ່ອນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນໃຫຍ່, ສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The region is predominantly rural.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກພື້ນແມ່ນຊົນນະບົດສ່ວນໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການຖືພາ, ການຖືພາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her pregnancy was a joyful experience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຖືພາຂອງນາງເປັນປະສົບການທີ່ມີຄວາມສຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະຄະຕິ
meaning list.sentence: Efforts are being made to combat racial prejudice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມພະຍາຍາມແມ່ນໄດ້ຖືກດໍາເນີນເພື່ອຕ້ານການລໍາອຽງເຊື້ອຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເບື້ອງຕົ້ນ, ການກະກຽມ
meaning list.sentence: The results are based on preliminary data.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ຂໍ້ມູນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນາຍົກລັດຖະມົນຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The premier addressed the nation in a televised speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາ​ຍົກ​ລັດ​ຖະ​ມົນ​ຕີ​ໄດ້​ກ່າວ​ຄໍາ​ປາ​ໄສ​ທາງ​ໂທລະ​ພາບ​ຕໍ່​ປະ​ເທດ​ຊາດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດຕິຖານ, proposition (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The argument is based on a false premise.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໂຕ້ຖຽງແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ການສົມມຸດຕິຖານທີ່ບໍ່ຖືກຕ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່ານິຍົມ, ການຈ່າຍເງິນເພີ່ມເຕີມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The insurance premium must be paid monthly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າປະກັນໄພຕ້ອງຈ່າຍເປັນລາຍເດືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນະນຳ, ແນະນຳ
meaning list.sentence: The doctor prescribed medication for her condition.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍໄດ້ສັ່ງຢາສໍາລັບສະພາບຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກປັກຮັກສາ, ປົກປັກຮັກສາ
meaning list.sentence: The preservation of historic buildings is important.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນທີ່ຈະຮັກສາອາຄານປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມມຸດ, ເດົາ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: I presume you are coming to the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍຄິດວ່າເຈົ້າມາປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊະນະ, ຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: Justice will prevail in the end.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນທີ່ສຸດ, ຄວາມຍຸຕິທໍາຈະຊະນະ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມແຜ່ຫຼາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prevalence of flu increases during winter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັດຕາການແຜ່ລະບາດຂອງໄຂ້ຫວັດໃຫຍ່ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນໃນຊ່ວງລະດູໜາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງກັນ, ປ້ອງກັນ
meaning list.sentence: Prevention is better than cure.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປ້ອງກັນດີກວ່າປິ່ນປົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຖືກລ້າ, ເສຍສະລະ
meaning list.sentence: Lions stalk their prey before attacking.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິງໂຕກ້າດລ່າສັດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າກ່ອນທີ່ຈະໂຈມຕີ.

meaning list.meaning: ອໍານວຍການໂຮງຮຽນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The principal gave a speech during the assembly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ອໍານວຍການໄດ້ກ່າວຄໍາປາໄສໃນລະຫວ່າງການປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປັບແຕ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The privatization of public services sparked a debate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເປັນເອກະຊົນຂອງການບໍລິການສາທາລະນະໄດ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດການໂຕ້ວາທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິດທິພິເສດ, ສິດທິພິເສດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: It is a privilege to work with such talented people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນເປັນສິດທິພິເສດທີ່ຈະເຮັດວຽກກັບຄົນທີ່ມີພອນສະຫວັນດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄົ້ນຄວ້າ, ສືບສວນ
meaning list.sentence: The probe into the scandal revealed new information.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສືບ​ສວນ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ກະ​ທູ້​ໄດ້​ເປີດ​ເຜີຍ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ໃຫມ່​.

meaning list.meaning: ກວດກາ, ກວດກາ
meaning list.sentence: The police probed the suspect’s background.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດໄດ້ສືບສວນປະຫວັດຂອງຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີບັນຫາ, ບັນຫາ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy is proving to be problematic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະໂຍບາຍໃໝ່ກຳລັງພິສູດວ່າມີບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການດຳເນີນຄະດີຕາມກົດໝາຍ, ນາທີ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The court proceedings lasted for three days.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ຄະດີ​ຂອງ​ສານ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ໄປ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ​ສາມ​ວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາຍໄດ້, ກໍາໄລ
meaning list.sentence: The proceeds from the event will go to charity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາຍໄດ້ຈາກເຫດການຈະໄປການກຸສົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປຸງແຕ່ງ, ຂະບວນການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Data processing takes time depending on its complexity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະມວນຜົນຂໍ້ມູນຕ້ອງໃຊ້ເວລາຂຶ້ນກັບຄວາມສັບສົນຂອງມັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປເຊດເຊີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The computer’s processor is very fast.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂປເຊດເຊີຂອງຄອມພິວເຕີແມ່ນໄວຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະກາດ, ປະກາດ
meaning list.sentence: The president proclaimed a state of emergency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະທານາທິບໍດີ​ໄດ້​ປະກາດ​ພາວະ​ສຸກ​ເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະ​ລິດ​ຕະ​ພັນ​, ປະ​ສິດ​ທິ​ພາບ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: The meeting was very productive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງປະຊຸມໄດ້ຜົນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜົນຜະລິດ, ປະສິດທິພາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Increasing productivity is a key goal for the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເພີ່ມຜົນຜະລິດແມ່ນເປົ້າຫມາຍທີ່ສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຳໄລ, ລວຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The business became highly profitable after the expansion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸລະກິດໄດ້ກາຍເປັນກໍາໄລສູງຫຼັງຈາກການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເລິກ, ປະທັບໃຈ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The speech had a profound impact on the audience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ປະ​ທັບ​ໃຈ​ຢ່າງ​ເລິກ​ເຊິ່ງ​ໃຫ້​ແກ່​ຜູ້​ຊົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຄາດຄະເນ, ການຄາດຄະເນ
meaning list.sentence: Sales projections for the next quarter look promising.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຄາດຄະເນການຂາຍສໍາລັບໄຕມາດຕໍ່ໄປເບິ່ງຄືວ່າມີແນວໂນ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັດເຈນ, ຊັດເຈນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: There is a pronounced difference between the two models.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມແຕກຕ່າງກັນທີ່ແຕກຕ່າງກັນລະຫວ່າງສອງແບບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຄສະນາເຜີຍແຜ່, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວເຜີຍແຜ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The regime used propaganda to control public opinion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບອບດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ໃຊ້ການໂຄສະນາເຜີຍແຜ່ເພື່ອຄວບຄຸມຄວາມຄິດເຫັນຂອງປະຊາຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເໜີ, ສະເໜີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He made a business proposition to the investors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີການສະເຫນີທຸລະກິດໃຫ້ກັບນັກລົງທຶນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟ້ອງ, ຟ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: The company was prosecuted for violating environmental laws.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຖືກຟ້ອງໃນຂໍ້ຫາລະເມີດກົດໝາຍສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄອຍະການ, ຄະດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prosecution presented strong evidence against the defendant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄອຍະການໄດ້ສະແດງຫຼັກຖານທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງຕໍ່ກັບຈໍາເລີຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄອຍະການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prosecutor questioned the witness during the trial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄອຍະການໄດ້ຊັກຖາມພະຍານໃນລະຫວ່າງການພິຈາລະນາຄະດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນໄປໄດ້, ອະນາຄົດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The prospective buyers visited the house yesterday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຊື້ທີ່ຄາດຫວັງໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມເຮືອນໃນມື້ວານນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮັ່ງມີ, ຄວາມຮັ່ງມີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country enjoyed decades of economic prosperity.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມຈະເລີນຮຸ່ງເຮືອງທາງດ້ານເສດຖະກິດຫຼາຍທົດສະວັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງກັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She wore a protective helmet while cycling.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໃສ່ໝວກກັນກະທົບໃນເວລາຂີ່ລົດຖີບ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິທີການ, ກົດລະບຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The diplomats followed protocol during the ceremony.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນດາ​ນັກ​ການ​ທູດ​ໄດ້​ປະຕິບັດ​ຕາມ​ພິທີການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂວງ, ພາກ​ພື້ນ (ຊື່)
meaning list.sentence: The policy was implemented in every province.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ປະຕິບັດ​ຢູ່​ທຸກ​ແຂວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວກັບຊົນນະບົດ, ທ້ອງຖິ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: The provincial government announced new reforms.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານແຂວງປະກາດການປະຕິຮູບໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະໜອງ, ການສະໜອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The contract includes a provision for early termination.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັນຍາປະກອບມີຂໍ້ສະເຫນີສໍາລັບການຢຸດເຊົາໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕຸ້ນ, ກະຕຸ້ນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The decision provoked widespread protests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຕັດສິນ​ໃຈ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈິດຕະວິທະຍາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He was admitted to a psychiatric hospital for treatment.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ປິ່ນປົວ​ຢູ່​ໂຮງໝໍ​ຈິດ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈັງຫວະ, ຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor checked her pulse to ensure she was stable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍກວດເບິ່ງກໍາມະຈອນຂອງລາວເພື່ອໃຫ້ແນ່ໃຈວ່າລາວມີຄວາມຫມັ້ນຄົງ.

meaning list.meaning: Pump (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The water pump broke during the drought.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປັ໊ມນ້ໍາແຕກໃນລະຫວ່າງການແຫ້ງແລ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສູບ
meaning list.sentence: They pumped water from the well.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ສູບນ້ໍາຈາກນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: Fist (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He threw a punch during the argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖິ້ມດີໃຈຫລາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງການໂຕ້ຖຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຈາະ
meaning list.sentence: He punched the punching bag with force.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຕີ​ຖົງ​ຕີ​ດ້ວຍ​ກຳລັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄໍາຖາມ, ຄໍາຖາມ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The customer had a query about the product warranty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລູກຄ້າມີຄໍາຖາມກ່ຽວກັບການຮັບປະກັນຜະລິດຕະພັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົ້ນຫາ, ຄົ້ນຄ້ວາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Their quest for treasure led them deep into the jungle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຊອກ​ຫາ​ຊັບ​ສິນ​ຂອງ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ພາ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ເລິກ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ໃນ​ປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເມືອງ, ຈ່າຍ (isim)
meaning list.sentence: The company imposed a quota on production levels.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ກໍານົດໂຄຕ້າໃນລະດັບການຜະລິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຣດາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The airplane was detected on the radar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍົນໄດ້ຖືກກວດພົບໃນ radar.

meaning list.meaning: ຮາກ, ຮາກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy brought radical changes to the system.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃຫມ່​ໄດ້​ນໍາ​ເອົາ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຮາກ​ກັບ​ລະ​ບົບ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໂກດ, ຄວາມໂກດແຄ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He was trembling with rage after the argument.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສັ່ນດ້ວຍຄວາມໂກດແຄ້ນຫຼັງຈາກການໂຕ້ຖຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເດັ່ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police conducted a raid on the suspected hideout.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ການ​ບຸກ​ໂຈມ​ຕີ​ບ່ອນ​ລີ້​ໄພ​ທີ່​ຕ້ອງ​ສົງ​ໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຈມຕີ
meaning list.sentence: They raided the warehouse looking for stolen goods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ບຸກ​ເຂົ້າ​ໄປ​ໃນ​ສາງ​ເພື່ອ​ຊອກ​ຫາ​ສິນ​ຄ້າ​ຖືກ​ລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຮມຊຸມນຸມ
meaning list.sentence: Thousands attended the political rally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫລາຍ​ພັນ​ຄົນ​ໄດ້​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ການ​ໂຮມ​ຊຸມນຸມ​ທາງ​ການ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕົ້າໂຮມ, ມາເຕົ້າໂຮມກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The team rallied after their initial loss.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມງານໄດ້ bounced ກັບຄືນໄປບ່ອນຈາກການສູນເສຍຄັ້ງທໍາອິດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her ranking in the competition improved this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈັດອັນດັບຂອງລາວໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນໄດ້ປັບປຸງໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂົ່ມຂືນ
meaning list.sentence: The victim reported the rape to the authorities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຖືກເຄາະຮ້າຍໄດ້ລາຍງານການຂົ່ມຂືນຕໍ່ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຂົ່ມຂືນ
meaning list.sentence: The criminal was arrested for attempting to rape.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຮ້າຍຖືກຈັບໃນຂໍ້ຫາພະຍາຍາມຂົ່ມຂືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດຕາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The ratio of men to women in the room was 2:1.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອັດຕາສ່ວນຂອງຜູ້ຊາຍກັບແມ່ຍິງຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງແມ່ນ 2: 1.

meaning list.meaning: ມີເຫດຜົນ, ສົມເຫດສົມຜົນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She made a rational decision based on facts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈຢ່າງມີເຫດຜົນໂດຍອີງໃສ່ຂໍ້ເທັດຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: Ray (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The sun's rays illuminated the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແສງຕາເວັນໄດ້ສ່ອງແສງໃຫ້ຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ງ່າຍ, ເຕັມໃຈ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The instructions are readily understandable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາແນະນໍາແມ່ນເຂົ້າໃຈງ່າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: realization, realization (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The realization of their goals took years of effort.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມັນໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍປີຂອງຄວາມພະຍາຍາມເພື່ອບັນລຸເປົ້າຫມາຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດເມນ, ອານາຈັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She excels in the realm of science.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດໃນດ້ານວິທະຍາສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບຄືນ, ກັບຄືນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The car’s rear window was shattered.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແວ່ນຫຼັງລົດແມ່ນແຕກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປູກຝັງ, ຍົກສູງບົດບາດ
meaning list.sentence: Farmers rear livestock for a living.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວກະສິກອນລ້ຽງສັດເພື່ອລ້ຽງຊີບ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫດຜົນ, ເຫດຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: Her reasoning was logical and well-founded.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການໃຫ້ເຫດຜົນຂອງລາວມີເຫດຜົນແລະເປັນພື້ນຖານທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝັ້ນໃຈ, ໝັ້ນໃຈ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: He reassured her that everything would be fine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໝັ້ນ​ໃຈ​ນາງ​ວ່າ​ທຸກ​ຢ່າງ​ຈະ​ເປັນ​ໄປ​ໄດ້.

meaning list.meaning: ກະບົດ, ກະບົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rebels fought against the oppressive regime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ກະບົດ​ໄດ້​ຕໍ່ສູ້​ກັບ​ລະບອບ​ການ​ກົດ​ຂີ່​ຂົ່ມ​ເຫັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະບົດ, ກະບົດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rebellion was swiftly suppressed by the authorities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການກະບົດໄດ້ຖືກສະກັດກັ້ນຢ່າງໄວວາໂດຍເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ຊື້, ຜູ້ທີ່ເອົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The recipient of the award gave a heartfelt speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ລາງວັນ​ໄດ້​ກ່າວ​ຄຳ​ປາ​ໄສ​ຢ່າງ​ຈິງ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: reconstruction, rebuilding (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The reconstruction of the city took years after the war.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຟື້ນຟູເມືອງໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍປີຫຼັງສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິບາຍ, ອະທິບາຍລະອຽດ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She recounted the events of the day in great detail.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ບັນຍາຍ​ເຫດການ​ໃນ​ມື້​ນັ້ນ​ຢ່າງ​ລະອຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງປະຊາມະຕິ, ການລົງປະຊາມະຕິ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country held a referendum on the new constitution.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະ​ເທດ​ນີ້​ໄດ້​ຈັດ​ການ​ລົງ​ປະຊາ​ມະຕິ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ລັດຖະທຳ​ມະນູນ​ສະບັບ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະທ້ອນ, ຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: The calm lake provided a perfect reflection of the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະເລສາບທີ່ງຽບສະຫງົບໄດ້ສະຫນອງການສະທ້ອນຂອງພູເຂົາຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປະຕິຮູບ, ການປັບປຸງ
meaning list.sentence: The government introduced major reforms in education.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ໄດ້​ປະ​ຕິ​ຮູບ​ຂະ​ຫນາດ​ໃຫຍ່​ໃນ​ການ​ສຶກ​ສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້, ປະຕິຮູບ
meaning list.sentence: The system needs to be reformed to function efficiently.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລະບົບຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການແກ້ໄຂເພື່ອໃຫ້ມັນເຮັດວຽກຢ່າງມີປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ພັກອາໄສ, ທີ່ພັກອາໄສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They sought refuge from the storm in a small cabin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າຊອກຫາທີ່ພັກອາໄສຈາກພະຍຸຢູ່ໃນກະຕູບຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ, ບໍ່ຍອມຮັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her refusal to cooperate caused delays in the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະຕິເສດຂອງລາວທີ່ຈະຮ່ວມມືເຮັດໃຫ້ໂຄງການຊັກຊ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: regain (ຄໍາ​ກິລິຍາ​)
meaning list.sentence: He worked hard to regain his reputation after the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ວຽກ​ໜັກ​ເພື່ອ​ຟື້ນ​ຟູ​ຊື່​ສຽງ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ທີ່​ເກີດ​ເລື່ອງ​ກະ​ທູ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດຍບໍ່ຄໍານຶງເຖິງນີ້, ໂດຍບໍ່ຄໍານຶງ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She continued her work regardless of the difficulties.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສືບຕໍ່ວຽກງານຂອງລາວໂດຍບໍ່ຄໍານຶງເຖິງຄວາມຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບອບ, ລະບອບການປົກຄອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country has been under a military regime for decades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຢູ່ພາຍໃຕ້ລະບອບທະຫານມາເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍສິບປີແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວບຄຸມ, ຄວບຄຸມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The financial regulator issued new guidelines for banks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຄວບຄຸມການເງິນໄດ້ເຜີຍແຜ່ຄໍາແນະນໍາໃຫມ່ສໍາລັບທະນາຄານ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະບຽບ, ກ່ຽວກັບລະບຽບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The regulatory framework needs to be updated.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂອບກົດລະບຽບຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການປັບປຸງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຟື້ນຟູ, ການປັບປຸງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The center provides rehabilitation services for injured athletes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສູນດັ່ງກ່າວໃຫ້ບໍລິການຟື້ນຟູສໍາລັບນັກກິລາທີ່ໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກຄອງ, ປົກຄອງ
meaning list.sentence: The reign of Queen Elizabeth II was historically significant.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປົກຄອງຂອງ Queen Elizabeth II ແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນທາງປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ປົກຄອງ
meaning list.sentence: Peace reigned throughout the kingdom.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສັນຕິພາບປົກຄອງທົ່ວອານາຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິເສດ
meaning list.sentence: Her application was met with rejection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃບສະໝັກຂອງລາວຖືກປະຕິເສດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ, ຄວາມກ່ຽວຂ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The topic has little relevance to the current discussion.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫົວຂໍ້ແມ່ນມີຄວາມກ່ຽວຂ້ອງຫນ້ອຍກັບການສົນທະນາໃນປະຈຸບັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໜ້າເຊື່ອຖື, ຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The reliability of the data is crucial for the study.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຫນ້າເຊື່ອຖືຂອງຂໍ້ມູນແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ການສຶກສາ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ເຕັມໃຈ, ບໍ່ເຕັມໃຈ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She was reluctant to share her personal information.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວລັງເລທີ່ຈະແບ່ງປັນຂໍ້ມູນສ່ວນຕົວ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນທີ່ເຫຼືອ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The remainder of the cake was stored in the fridge.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສ່ວນທີ່ຍັງເຫຼືອຂອງ cake ໄດ້ຖືກເກັບໄວ້ໃນຕູ້ເຢັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາກ, ສົບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The remains of the ancient city were uncovered during the excavation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາກຫັກພັງຂອງເມືອງບູຮານໄດ້ຖືກຄົ້ນພົບໃນລະຫວ່າງການຂຸດຄົ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ວິທີແກ້ໄຂ, ວິທີແກ້ໄຂ
meaning list.sentence: The best remedy for a cold is rest and hydration.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວິທີແກ້ໄຂທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດສໍາລັບການເປັນຫວັດແມ່ນພັກຜ່ອນແລະນ້ໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຕືອນ, ເຕືອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She set a reminder on her phone for the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັ້ງເຕືອນສໍາລັບການປະຊຸມຢູ່ໃນໂທລະສັບຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຍກຍ້າຍ, ການໂຍກຍ້າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The removal of the old furniture made space for new items.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຖອດເຄື່ອງເຟີນີເຈີເກົ່າທີ່ເຮັດເປັນຫ້ອງສໍາລັບລາຍການໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮັດ, ເພື່ອນໍາສະເຫນີ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The heavy rain rendered the roads impassable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນຕົກໜັກເຮັດໃຫ້ຖະໜົນຫົນທາງບໍ່ສະດວກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ອາຍຸ, ຂະຫຍາຍ
meaning list.sentence: She renewed her passport before the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຕໍ່ຫນັງສືຜ່ານແດນຂອງລາວກ່ອນການເດີນທາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ, ທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The restaurant is renowned for its excellent cuisine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮ້ານອາຫານແມ່ນມີຊື່ສຽງສໍາລັບອາຫານທີ່ດີເລີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິນຄ້າໃຫ້ເຊົ່າ, ຄ່າເຊົ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rental for the apartment is due next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າເຊົ່າອາພາດເມັນຈະຖືກຈ່າຍໃນອາທິດຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການທົດແທນ, ການປ່ຽນແປງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company provided a replacement for the defective product.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ສະຫນອງການທົດແທນສໍາລັບຜະລິດຕະພັນທີ່ຜິດປົກກະຕິ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວຫາ, ກ່າວຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The actor is reportedly considering a new role.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງໄດ້ຖືກກ່າວວ່າກໍາລັງພິຈາລະນາບົດບາດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ນໍາ​ສະ​ເຫນີ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The union demands better representation for workers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະ​ຫະ​ພັນ​ຮຽກ​ຮ້ອງ​ໃຫ້​ມີ​ການ​ເປັນ​ຕົວ​ແທນ​ທີ່​ດີກ​ວ່າ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ຄົນ​ງານ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຜະລິດ, ແຜ່ພັນ
meaning list.sentence: The machine can reproduce documents in color.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງສາມາດຜະລິດເອກະສານໃນສີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສືບພັນ, ການແຜ່ພັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist studied plant reproduction.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ສຶກສາການແຜ່ພັນຂອງພືດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາທາລະນະລັດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: France is a republic with a long history.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດຝຣັ່ງເປັນສາທາລະນະລັດທີ່ມີປະຫວັດສາດອັນຍາວນານ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ້າຍ, ຄ້າຍ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: She closely resembles her mother.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງເບິ່ງຄືກັບແມ່ຂອງນາງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ອາໄສຢູ່, ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ
meaning list.sentence: He resides in a small village outside the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອາໃສຢູ່ໃນບ້ານນ້ອຍໆນອກເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ, ທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The official residence of the ambassador is in the capital.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີ່​ພັກ​ຢ່າງ​ເປັນ​ທາງ​ການ​ຂອງ​ເອກ​ອັກ​ຄະ​ລັດ​ຖະ​ທູດ​ແມ່ນ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ນະ​ຄອນ​ຫຼວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສ, ກ່ຽວກັບການຕັ້ງຖິ່ນຖານ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This area is mostly residential with few commercial properties.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນທີ່ນີ້ເປັນທີ່ຢູ່ອາໄສສ່ວນໃຫຍ່, ມີຈໍານວນຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍຂອງຊັບສິນການຄ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: residue, residue (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The coffee left a residue at the bottom of the cup.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກາເຟທີ່ເຫລືອຢູ່ດ້ານລຸ່ມຂອງຈອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາອອກ, ອອກຈາກຕໍາແໜ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her resignation surprised everyone at the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລາອອກຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນໃນບໍລິສັດແປກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ານ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The resistance to change was stronger than expected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຕ້ານທານຕໍ່ການປ່ຽນແປງແມ່ນແຂງແຮງກວ່າທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອງຕົນເອງ, ທີ່ມັນເປັນຂອງ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The participants were asked to return to their respective seats.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໄດ້ຖືກຂໍໃຫ້ກັບຄືນໄປຫາບ່ອນນັ່ງຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕາມລຳດັບ
meaning list.sentence: The books were placed on the shelf, fiction and non-fiction respectively.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມຖືກວາງຢູ່ເທິງຊັ້ນວາງເປັນນິຍາຍ ແລະບໍ່ແມ່ນນິທານຕາມລຳດັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຟື້ນຟູ, ສ້ອມແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The restoration of the historic building took two years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຟື້ນຟູອາຄານປະຫວັດສາດໃຊ້ເວລາສອງປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຳກັດ, ຄວບຄຸມ
meaning list.sentence: The police acted with restraint during the protest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ທຳ​ການ​ຄວບ​ຄຸມ​ໃນ​ລະ​ຫວ່າງ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບຕໍ່, ສືບຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: The meeting will resume after lunch.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງປະຊຸມຈະສືບຕໍ່ຫຼັງຈາກອາຫານທ່ຽງ.

meaning list.meaning: retreat, retreat (ຄໍານາມ) retreat
meaning list.sentence: The soldiers made a strategic retreat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະຫານ​ໄດ້​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ການ​ຖອຍຫລັງ​ທາງ​ຍຸດ​ທະ​ສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອຍຫຼັງ
meaning list.sentence: They decided to retreat to safer ground.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຖອຍ​ກັບ​ເຂດ​ທີ່​ປອດ​ໄພ​ກວ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເອົາຄືນ, ເພື່ອຊ່ວຍປະຢັດ
meaning list.sentence: He managed to retrieve the document from the trash folder.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈັດການເອົາເອກະສານອອກຈາກໂຟນເດີ້ຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເປີດເຜີຍ, ການດົນໃຈ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The book's ending was a shocking revelation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕອນທ້າຍຂອງປຶ້ມນັ້ນເປັນການເປີດເຜີຍທີ່ໜ້າປະຫລາດໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແກ້ແຄ້ນ, ການແກ້ແຄ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He sought revenge for the injustice done to his family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊອກຫາການແກ້ແຄ້ນຕໍ່ຄວາມບໍ່ຍຸຕິທໍາທີ່ເຮັດກັບຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ປີ້ນກັບກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The company reversed its decision to close the factory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ປະຕິເສດການຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ຈະປິດໂຮງງານ.

meaning list.meaning: ກົງກັນຂ້າມ, ກົງກັນຂ້າມ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The reverse side of the coin has a different design.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການອອກແບບທີ່ແຕກຕ່າງກັນຢູ່ດ້ານກົງກັນຂ້າມຂອງຫຼຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປີ້ນ, ເກຍປີ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He put the car into reverse and backed out of the driveway.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເອົາ​ລົດ​ຄັນ​ນັ້ນ​ປີ້ນ​ກັບ​ທາງ​ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຟື້ນຟູ, ຟື້ນຄືນຊີວິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The cultural festival led to a revival of traditional arts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ບຸນ​ວັດ​ທະ​ນະ​ທຳ​ໄດ້​ນຳ​ໄປ​ສູ່​ການ​ຟື້ນ​ຟູ​ສິ​ລະ​ປະ​ພື້ນ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟື້ນຟູ, ຟື້ນຟູ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The new policy aims to revive the economy.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ໃຫມ່​ເພື່ອ​ແນ​ໃສ່​ກະ​ຕຸ້ນ​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການ​ປະ​ຕິ​ວັດ​, ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຢ່າງ​ຮຸນ​ແຮງ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: The invention of the internet was a revolutionary development.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປະດິດສ້າງອິນເຕີເນັດແມ່ນການພັດທະນາປະຕິວັດ.

meaning list.meaning: Rhetoric, ສິລະປະການເວົ້າຢ່າງມີປະສິດທິພາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The politician’s rhetoric appealed to the emotions of the crowd.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາເວົ້າຂອງນັກການເມືອງໄດ້ດຶງດູດຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກຂອງຝູງຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປືນສັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The soldier cleaned his rifle before the mission.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະ​ຫານ​ໄດ້​ທໍາ​ຄວາມ​ສະ​ອາດ rifle ຂອງ​ຕົນ​ກ່ອນ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ປະ​ຕິ​ບັດ​ສາດ​ສະ​ຫນາ​ຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກະບົດ, ການລຸກຮືຂຶ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The riot broke out after the controversial decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະ​ທະ​ກັນ​ໄດ້​ເກີດ​ຂຶ້ນ​ຫລັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ຕັດ​ສິນ​ໃຈ​ທີ່​ຂັດ​ແຍ້ງ​ກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈີກ, ມ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: He accidentally ripped his shirt while climbing the fence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ບັງ​ເອີນ​ຈີກ​ເສື້ອ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ໃນ​ຂະນະ​ທີ່​ປີນ​ຮົ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິທີການ, ພິທີການ
meaning list.sentence: The tribe performed a ritual to welcome the new season.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວ​ເຜົ່າ​ນຸ່ງ​ດຳ​ເນີນ​ພິທີ​ຕ້ອນຮັບ​ລະດູບານ​ໃໝ່.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂງ, ແຂງ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The company has a robust financial position.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີຕໍາແຫນ່ງທາງດ້ານການເງິນທີ່ເຂັ້ມແຂງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັ່ນ, ສັ່ນ
meaning list.sentence: The earthquake rocked the entire city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜ່ນດິນໄຫວໄດ້ສັ່ນສະເທືອນເມືອງທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄມ້
meaning list.sentence: The fisherman used a long rod to catch fish.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວປະມົງໄດ້ໃຊ້ໄມ້ຄ້ອນຍາວເພື່ອຈັບປາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັນ, ຫັນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກຈະຫມຸນຮອບແກນຂອງມັນທຸກໆ 24 ຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໝູນວຽນ, ກັບຄືນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The rotation of the earth causes day and night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຫມູນວຽນຂອງໂລກສ້າງທັງກາງຄືນແລະກາງເວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ​ສິນ​ຕັດ​ສິນ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The court’s ruling was in favor of the plaintiff.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈຂອງສານເຮັດໃຫ້ໂຈດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ່າວລື, ນິນທາ
meaning list.sentence: There is a rumour that the company is planning layoffs.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຂ່າວລືວ່າບໍລິສັດກໍາລັງວາງແຜນການປົດຕໍາແຫນ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He was sacked for failing to meet deadlines.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຖືກໄລ່ອອກຍ້ອນບໍ່ຮອດກຳນົດເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັກສິດ
meaning list.sentence: The temple is a sacred place for worshippers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັດ​ເປັນ​ສະຖານ​ທີ່​ສັກສິດ​ສຳລັບ​ຜູ້​ມາ​ນະມັດສະການ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສຍສະລະ, ເສຍສະລະ
meaning list.sentence: Her sacrifice ensured a better future for her children.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເສຍສະຫຼະຂອງນາງໄດ້ຮັບປະກັນອະນາຄົດທີ່ດີກວ່າສໍາລັບລູກໆຂອງນາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖວາຍບູຊາ, ຖວາຍບູຊາ
meaning list.sentence: They sacrificed their time to help the community.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້າເສຍສະຫຼະເວລາຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອສັງຄົມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄພ່ພົນ, ໄພ່ພົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Saint Francis is known for his love of animals.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຊນ Francis ແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບຄວາມຮັກຂອງສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈືຂໍ້ມູນການ, ໂຊກດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He stayed for the sake of his family.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຢູ່ເພື່ອຜົນປະໂຫຍດຂອງຄອບຄົວຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລົງໂທດ, ການອະນຸມັດ
meaning list.sentence: The UN imposed economic sanctions on the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຫະ​ປະຊາ​ຊາດ​ໄດ້​ວາງ​ມາດ​ຕະການ​ລົງ​ໂທດ​ດ້ານ​ເສດຖະກິດ​ຕໍ່​ປະ​ເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິດທິໃນການເວົ້າ
meaning list.sentence: Everyone should have a say in important decisions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທຸກໆຄົນຄວນມີຄໍາເວົ້າໃນການຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະແຈກກະຈາຍ, ກະແຈກກະຈາຍ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The toys were scattered all over the floor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂອງຫຼິ້ນໄດ້ຖືກກະແຈກກະຈາຍໄປທົ່ວພື້ນເຮືອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໄສ, ສົງໄສ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was sceptical about the new policy’s effectiveness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມສົງໄສກ່ຽວກັບປະສິດທິຜົນຂອງນະໂຍບາຍໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອບເຂດ, ພື້ນທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scope of the project is broader than anticipated.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂອບເຂດຂອງໂຄງການແມ່ນກວ້າງກວ່າທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: Screw (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He tightened the screw to secure the shelf.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮັດສະກູໃຫ້ແຫນ້ນເພື່ອຮັບປະກັນຊັ້ນວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກ້ໄຂດ້ວຍສະກູ
meaning list.sentence: She screwed the pieces of wood together.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມຕ່ອນໄມ້ຮ່ວມກັນກັບ screws.

meaning list.meaning: ກວດກາ, ກວດກາຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງ
meaning list.sentence: The documents are under close scrutiny by the authorities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເອກະສານແມ່ນໄດ້ຖືກກວດກາຢ່າງລະມັດລະວັງໂດຍເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປະທັບຕາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The letter was closed with a wax seal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຈົດຫມາຍໄດ້ຖືກຜະນຶກເຂົ້າກັນດ້ວຍປະທັບຕາຂີ້ເຜີ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປິດ, ປະທັບຕາ
meaning list.sentence: He sealed the envelope before sending it.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ປະທັບຕາຈົດໝາຍໄວ້ກ່ອນສົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທາງໂລກ, ບໍ່ນັບຖືສາສະໜາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country has a secular government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດມີລັດຖະບານທາງໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ປາກົດຂື້ນ, ຄືກັບວ່າ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The project is seemingly simple but actually very complex.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວເບິ່ງຄືວ່າງ່າຍດາຍແຕ່ຕົວຈິງແລ້ວສະລັບສັບຊ້ອນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ວນ, ສິ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The orange was divided into segments.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສີສົ້ມຕັດເຂົ້າໄປໃນຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນນໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຶດ, ຍຶດ
meaning list.sentence: The police seized the stolen goods.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕໍາຫຼວດໄດ້ຍຶດສິນຄ້າທີ່ຖືກລັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຄ່ອຍ
meaning list.sentence: She seldom visits her hometown anymore.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ຄ່ອຍໄດ້ໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມບ້ານເກີດຂອງລາວອີກຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: Picky (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The school has a very selective admission process.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງຮຽນມີຂະບວນການຄັດເລືອກຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ວຽງຈັນຝົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The senator delivered a speech on healthcare reform.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະມາຊິກສະພາສູງໄດ້ກ່າວ ຄຳ ປາໄສກ່ຽວກັບການປະຕິຮູບດ້ານສຸຂະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກ, ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກ
meaning list.sentence: She felt a strange sensation in her arm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮູ້ສຶກແປກປະຫລາດຢູ່ໃນແຂນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວ, ຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He has a sensitivity to loud noises.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວມີຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວຕໍ່ກັບສຽງດັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກ, ຄວາມຄິດ
meaning list.sentence: The sentiment among the workers was one of frustration.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຮູ້ສຶກລະຫວ່າງຄົນງານແມ່ນຄວາມຜິດຫວັງ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ແຍກ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The separation of church and state is an important principle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ແບ່ງ​ແຍກ​ສາ​ສ​ນາ​ຈັກ​ແລະ​ລັດ​ເປັນ​ຫຼັກ​ການ​ທີ່​ສໍາ​ຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸດ, ໃນຊຸດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police are investigating a serial burglary case.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດກຳລັງສືບສວນຄະດີລັກຂະໂມຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕົກລົງ, ປະນີປະນອມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two parties reached a settlement in the lawsuit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພາກສ່ວນຕ່າງໆໄດ້ບັນລຸການປະນີປະນອມໃນກໍລະນີ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຕິດຕັ້ງ, ຮູບແບບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The set-up for the new computer system took hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕິດຕັ້ງລະບົບຄອມພິວເຕີໃໝ່ໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພດ
meaning list.sentence: The book explores themes of identity and sexuality.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມນີ້ຄົ້ນຄວ້າຫົວຂໍ້ກ່ຽວກັບຕົວຕົນ ແລະເພດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຸ້ນສ່ວນ, ຫຸ້ນສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The shareholders will meet to discuss the company’s future.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຖືຫຸ້ນຈະປະຊຸມເພື່ອປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບອະນາຄົດຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳລາຍ, ທຳລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The earthquake shattered windows across the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ​ແຜ່ນດິນ​ໄຫວ​ໄດ້​ທຳລາຍ​ປ່ອງຢ້ຽມ​ທົ່ວ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: to spill, to flow (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The tree sheds its leaves in autumn.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົ້ນໄມ້ຫຼົ່ນໃບໃນລະດູໃບໄມ້ປົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ສົມບູນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The sheer size of the building is impressive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂະຫນາດຂອງອາຄານແມ່ນປະທັບໃຈຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂົນສົ່ງ, ການຂົນສົ່ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company offers free shipping for orders over $50.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ​ລິ​ສັດ​ສະ​ຫນອງ​ການ​ສົ່ງ​ຟຣີ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ຄໍາ​ສັ່ງ​ຫຼາຍ​ກວ່າ $50​.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນໍ່ໄມ້ສ່ວນຫຼາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The director decided to shoot the scene in the morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ອໍານວຍການໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈທີ່ຈະຍິງ scene ໃນຕອນເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຍໍ້ລົງ, ຫຍໍ້
meaning list.sentence: The sweater shrank after being washed in hot water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເສື້ອຢືດໄດ້ຫຼຸດລົງຫຼັງຈາກລ້າງໃນນ້ໍາຮ້ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍັບຍັ້ງ
meaning list.sentence: He shrugged when asked about the decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຍັບຍັ້ງເມື່ອຖືກຖາມກ່ຽວກັບການຕັດສິນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ທ່າທາງຍັບຍັ້ງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her shrug indicated her indifference.
meaning list.sentence translation: shrug ລາວສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນ indifference ລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອນຫາຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: She sighed with relief after hearing the good news.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຫາຍໃຈໂລ່ງໃຈຫຼັງຈາກໄດ້ຍິນຂ່າວດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອນຫາຍໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: His sigh could be heard across the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຫາຍໃຈຂອງລາວສາມາດໄດ້ຍິນຈາກທົ່ວຫ້ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮຽນແບບ, ເພື່ອຈຳລອງ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The program is designed to simulate real-life conditions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງ​ການ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ອອກ​ແບບ​ເພື່ອ​ຈໍາ​ລອງ​ສະ​ພາບ​ການ​ໃນ​ຊີ​ວິດ​ທີ່​ແທ້​ຈິງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈຳລອງ, ພາບເຄື່ອນໄຫວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The flight simulation helped the pilots practice emergency scenarios.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈຳລອງການບິນໄດ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ນັກບິນປະຕິບັດສະຖານະການສຸກເສີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ພ້ອມໆກັນ
meaning list.sentence: The two events occurred simultaneously.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການທັງສອງເກີດຂຶ້ນພ້ອມກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: In many religions, lying is considered a sin.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຫຼາຍສາສະຫນາ, ການຕົວະຖືວ່າເປັນບາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັ້ງຢູ່, ສ້າງຕັ້ງຂຶ້ນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hotel is situated near the city center.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງແຮມຕັ້ງຢູ່ໃກ້ກັບໃຈກາງເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂຽນ, ຮ່າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She made a quick sketch of the landscape.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ແຕ້ມ​ຮູບ​ພາບ​ພູມ​ສັນ​ຖານ​ໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດ, ຂ້າມ
meaning list.sentence: He skipped breakfast to catch the early train.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຂ້າມອາຫານເຊົ້າເພື່ອໄປຮອດລົດໄຟຕົ້ນໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂັດ, ປິດໄວ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She slammed the door in anger.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຕີ​ປະຕູ​ຢ່າງ​ໃຈ​ຮ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕີ, ຕີ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: He slapped the table to get everyone’s attention.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕີຢູ່ເທິງໂຕະເພື່ອໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນສົນໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ, ຫຼຸດ
meaning list.sentence: The company plans to slash its prices during the sale.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຫຼຸດລົງລາຄາຂອງຕົນໃນລະຫວ່າງການຂາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂ້າທາດ
meaning list.sentence: Slavery was abolished in many countries during the 19th century.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເປັນຂ້າທາດໄດ້ຖືກຍົກເລີກໃນຫຼາຍປະເທດໃນສະຕະວັດທີ 19.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັງ, ຊ່ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Insert the coin into the slot to start the machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃສ່ຫຼຽນເຂົ້າໄປໃນຊ່ອງສຽບເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນເຄື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພພັງ
meaning list.sentence: The kids accidentally smashed the window.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍໄດ້ແຕກປ່ອງຢ້ຽມໂດຍບັງເອີນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ້າງສຽງກະທັນຫັນ
meaning list.sentence: She snapped the twig in half.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແຍກສາຂາອອກເປັນສອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ປຽກ, ແຊ່ນ້ໍາ
meaning list.sentence: The rain soaked his clothes completely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຝົນ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເສື້ອ​ຜ້າ​ລາວ​ປຽກ​ໝົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກວ່ງຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The eagle soared high above the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນົກອິນຊີ​ໄດ້​ຂຶ້ນ​ໄປ​ເທິງ​ພູເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັງຄົມນິຍົມ
meaning list.sentence: He supports socialist policies in government.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສະຫນັບສະຫນູນນະໂຍບາຍສັງຄົມນິຍົມໃນລັດຖະບານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດດ່ຽວ
meaning list.sentence: She was the sole survivor of the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນຜູ້ລອດຊີວິດຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເທົ່ານັ້ນ, ພຽງແຕ່ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: The decision was based solely on financial considerations.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຕັດສິນໃຈດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ການພິຈາລະນາທາງດ້ານການເງິນເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ທະນາຍຄວາມ, ທີ່ປຶກສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The solicitor prepared all the necessary legal documents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທະນາຍຄວາມໄດ້ກະກຽມເອກະສານທາງດ້ານກົດຫມາຍທີ່ຈໍາເປັນທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາມັກຄີ, ສາມັກຄີ
meaning list.sentence: The workers showed solidarity by organizing a strike.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ຄົນ​ງານ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ແດງ​ຄວາມ​ສາ​ມັກ​ຄີ​ໂດຍ​ການ​ຈັດ​ຕັ້ງ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົນດຽວ
meaning list.sentence: He completed the project solo.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ສໍາເລັດໂຄງການຢ່າງດຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະແດງດ່ຽວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her solo was the highlight of the concert.
meaning list.sentence translation: solo ຂອງລາວແມ່ນຈຸດເດັ່ນຂອງຄອນເສີດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຂງ, sensible (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She gave sound advice during the meeting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໃຫ້​ຄຳ​ແນະນຳ​ຢ່າງ​ໜັກ​ແໜ້ນ​ໃນ​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິປະໄຕ, ເອກະລາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The country fought for its sovereignty for decades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເທດດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຕໍ່ສູ້ເພື່ອອະທິປະໄຕຂອງຕົນມາເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍທົດສະວັດແລ້ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂີ້ເຫຍື້ອ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Most of the messages in her inbox were spam.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂໍ້ຄວາມສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ໃນອິນບັອກຂອງລາວເປັນສະແປມ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄລ​ຍະ​ເວ​ລາ​, ເພື່ອ​ປະ​ກອບ​ມີ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​, verb​)
meaning list.sentence: His career spanned over five decades.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຊີບຂອງລາວໄດ້ໃຊ້ເວລາຫຼາຍກວ່າຫ້າທົດສະວັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຍກ, ຫວ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: Can you spare a moment to talk?
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າສາມາດໃຊ້ເວລາລົມກັນໄດ້ບໍ?

meaning list.meaning: ຈູດ, ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The announcement sparked protests across the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ປະກາດ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ທົ່ວ​ເມືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເພາະ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is specialized in environmental law.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຊ່ຽວຊານດ້ານກົດໝາຍສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະເພາະ, ສະເພາະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The product meets the required specifications.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນປະຕິບັດຕາມຂໍ້ກໍານົດທີ່ກໍານົດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຢ່າງ, ຕົວຢ່າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The museum displayed a rare specimen of an ancient fossil.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫໍພິພິທະພັນໄດ້ສະແດງຕົວຢ່າງຟອດຊິນໂບຮານທີ່ຫາຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພູມສັນຖານ, spectacle (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The fireworks display was a magnificent spectacle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ງານ​ວາງສະ​ແດງ​ບັ້ງ​ໄຟ​ດອກ​ເປັນ​ພາບ​ທີ່​ໜ້າ​ປະ​ທັບ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັດລົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The organization works with a wide spectrum of issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອົງການຈັດຕັ້ງເຮັດວຽກກັບບັນຫາທີ່ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສະກົດຄໍາ, ໄລຍະເວລາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She fell under the spell of the mysterious story.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກຈັບໂດຍເລື່ອງທີ່ລຶກລັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ວົງມົນ, ພື້ນທີ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The earth is often described as a sphere.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແຜ່ນດິນໂລກມັກຈະຖືກອະທິບາຍວ່າເປັນຮູບຊົງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫັນ, ຫັນ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: The wheel spun rapidly as the car accelerated.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໃນຂະນະທີ່ລົດໄດ້ເລັ່ງ, ລໍ້ໄດ້ຫມຸນຢ່າງໄວວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ກັບຄືນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The dancer performed an impressive spin on stage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກເຕັ້ນລໍາໄດ້ສະແດງການສະແດງທີ່ຫນ້າປະທັບໃຈຢູ່ເທິງເວທີ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະດູກສັນຫຼັງ
meaning list.sentence: A strong spine is essential for good posture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະດູກສັນຫຼັງແຂງແມ່ນສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບການ posture ທີ່ດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈຸດ​ສຸມ, ຈຸດ​ໃຈກາງ​ຂອງ​ການ​ເອົາ​ໃຈ​ໃສ່ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The actor enjoyed being in the spotlight during the premiere.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງມັກເປັນຈຸດໃຈກາງຂອງຄວາມສົນໃຈໃນຮອບປະຖົມມະທັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄູ່ສົມລົດ
meaning list.sentence: She and her spouse are celebrating their 10th wedding anniversary.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວແລະພັນລະຍາຂອງລາວກໍາລັງສະເຫຼີມສະຫຼອງວັນແຕ່ງງານຄົບຮອບ 10 ປີຂອງພວກເຂົາ.

meaning list.meaning: Spy (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The spy was captured while trying to steal classified information.
meaning list.sentence translation: spy ໄດ້​ຖືກ​ຈັບ​ໄດ້​ຄວາມ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ລັກ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ການ​ຈັດ​ປະ​ເພດ​.

meaning list.meaning: ສອດແນມ, ສອດແນມ
meaning list.sentence: He spied on the neighbors from his window.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສອດແນມເບິ່ງເພື່ອນບ້ານຈາກປ່ອງຢ້ຽມຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີມ, ໜ່ວຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The squad was deployed for a special mission.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໜ່ວຍ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ຖືກ​ນຳ​ໃຊ້​ເພື່ອ​ປະຕິບັດ​ພາລະກິດ​ພິ​ເສດ.

meaning list.meaning: ບີບ, ບີບ
meaning list.sentence: She squeezed the orange to make fresh juice.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ບີບ​ໝາກ​ກ້ຽງ​ເພື່ອ​ເຮັດ​ນ້ຳ​ສົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທງ
meaning list.sentence: The attacker stabbed him in the arm.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ໂຈມຕີໄດ້ແທງລາວໃສ່ແຂນ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກໍານົດ, ຄວາມຫມັ້ນຄົງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Economic stability is crucial for growth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖຽນລະພາບທາງດ້ານເສດຖະກິດແມ່ນສໍາຄັນຕໍ່ການເຕີບໂຕ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອດຸ່ນດ່ຽງ, ສະຖຽນລະພາບ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The government implemented measures to stabilize the currency.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານໄດ້ໃຊ້ມາດຕະການຮັກສາສະຖຽນລະພາບຂອງເງິນຕາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫຸ້ນ, ສະເຕກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She owns a 30% stake in the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນເຈົ້າຂອງຮຸ້ນ 30% ໃນບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄົງ, ຖາວອນ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They have a standing invitation to visit the club.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກ​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ມີ​ຄໍາ​ເຊີນ​ຢືນ​ເພື່ອ​ໄປ​ຢ້ຽມ​ຢາມ​ສະ​ໂມ​ສອນ​ໄດ້​.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄັ່ງຄັດ, ແຂງ
meaning list.sentence: The stark reality of the situation shocked everyone.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາບຄວາມເປັນຈິງທີ່ໂຫດຮ້າຍເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນຕົກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖິຕິ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report includes detailed statistical data.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານປະກອບມີຂໍ້ມູນສະຖິຕິລະອຽດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊີ້​ນຳ, ຊີ້​ນຳ
meaning list.sentence: He steered the car into the parking space.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຊີ້​ນຳ​ລົດ​ໄປ​ບ່ອນ​ຈອດ​ລົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The flower’s stem was long and green.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລໍາຕົ້ນຂອງດອກແມ່ນຍາວແລະມີສີຂຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ມາ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: His fear stems from a past experience.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຢ້ານກົວຂອງລາວແມ່ນມາຈາກປະສົບການທີ່ຜ່ານມາ.

meaning list.meaning: Stereotype (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie challenges traditional gender stereotypes.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໄດ້ທ້າທາຍລັກສະນະບົດບາດຍິງຊາຍແບບດັ້ງເດີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸກຍູ້, ກະຕຸ້ນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The new tax policy provides a stimulus for economic growth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍ​ບາຍ​ພາ​ສີ​ໃຫມ່​ສະ​ຫນອງ​ການ​ຊຸກ​ຍູ້​ການ​ເຕີບ​ໂຕ​ເສດ​ຖະ​ກິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕຸ້ນ, ກະຕຸ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: She stirred the soup with a wooden spoon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ stirred ແກງດ້ວຍບ່ວງໄມ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການເກັບຮັກສາ, ການເກັບຮັກສາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The boxes were put in storage until needed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກ່ອງຖືກວາງໄວ້ໃນບ່ອນເກັບຮັກສາຈົນກ່ວາຈໍາເປັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັດເຈນ, ເຂົ້າໃຈງ່າຍ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The instructions were straightforward and easy to follow.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາແນະນໍາແມ່ນຈະແຈ້ງແລະງ່າຍທີ່ຈະປະຕິບັດຕາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຄັ່ງຕຶງ, ເມື່ອຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The strain of working long hours affected her health.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກົດດັນຂອງການເຮັດວຽກຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ສຸຂະພາບຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຊືອກ, ເສັ້ນຜົມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A single strand of hair was found at the crime scene.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພົບເຫັນເສັ້ນຜົມເສັ້ນດຽວຢູ່ບ່ອນເກີດເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸດທະສາດ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company made a strategic decision to expand its operations overseas.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈຍຸດທະສາດເພື່ອຂະຫຍາຍການດໍາເນີນງານຢູ່ຕ່າງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂດດເດັ່ນ, ໂດດເດັ່ນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her striking red dress caught everyone’s attention.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຄື່ອງນຸ່ງສີແດງທີ່ສວຍງາມຂອງນາງໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມສົນໃຈຈາກທຸກໆຄົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແຖບ, ສິ້ນແຄບຍາວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He cut the fabric into thin strips.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດຜ້າອອກເປັນແຖບບາງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ປອກເປືອກອອກ
meaning list.sentence: The old paint was stripped off the walls.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສີເກົ່າຖືກເອົາອອກຈາກຝາ.

meaning list.meaning: ພະຍາຍາມ, ພະຍາຍາມ (verb)
meaning list.sentence: She strives for excellence in all her work.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວພະຍາຍາມເພື່ອຄວາມເປັນເລີດໃນທຸກວຽກງານຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງສ້າງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The building has several structural issues that need repair.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຄານດັ່ງກ່າວມີບັນຫາໂຄງສ້າງຈໍານວນຫນຶ່ງທີ່ຕ້ອງໄດ້ຮັບການສ້ອມແປງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະດຸດ, ສະດຸດ
meaning list.sentence: He stumbled on a rock and almost fell.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ໄດ້​ຍ່າງ​ຂ້າມ​ກ້ອນ​ຫີນ​ແລະ​ເກືອບ​ລົ້ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຫລາດໃຈ, ຕົກຕະລຶງ
meaning list.sentence: The news stunned everyone in the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ່າວດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນໃນຫ້ອງແປກໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຈັດສົ່ງ, ການສະເຫນີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The deadline for submission of applications is next week.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳນົດເວລາການສະໝັກແມ່ນອາທິດໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະມາຊິກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The magazine has over 1 million subscribers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວາລະສານມີຫຼາຍກວ່າ 1 ລ້ານຈອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຈອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She renewed her subscription to the online service.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ສະ​ຫມັກ​ບໍ​ລິ​ການ​ອອນ​ໄລ​ນ​໌​ຕໍ່​ອາ​ຍຸ​.

meaning list.meaning: ການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອຂອງລັດ, ເງິນອຸດໜູນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The government provided subsidies for renewable energy projects.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້ການ​ສະໜັບສະໜູນ​ແກ່​ໂຄງການ​ພະລັງງານ​ທົດ​ແທນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຳຄັນ, ໃຫຍ່ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company made a substantial profit last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ກໍາໄລຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ​, ຢ່າງ​ຫຼວງ​ຫຼາຍ (adverb​)
meaning list.sentence: The cost of the project has increased substantially.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍຂອງໂຄງການເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແທນ, ແທນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was a substitute teacher for the day.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ເປັນຄູສອນທົດແທນສໍາລັບມື້.

meaning list.meaning: ແທນ, ແທນທີ່
meaning list.sentence: You can substitute butter with margarine in this recipe.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານສາມາດນໍາໃຊ້ margarine ແທນມັນເບີໃນສູດນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຍກຍ້າຍ, ການທົດແທນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The substitution of sugar with honey made the dessert healthier.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການທົດແທນນໍ້າຕານດ້ວຍນໍ້າເຜິ້ງເຮັດໃຫ້ຂອງຫວານມີສຸຂະພາບດີ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໂຍນ, ຍາກທີ່ຈະສັງເກດເຫັນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: There was a subtle change in her tone during the conversation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີການປ່ຽນແປງເລັກນ້ອຍໃນນໍ້າສຽງຂອງລາວໃນລະຫວ່າງການສົນທະນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊານເມືອງ, ຊານເມືອງ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They moved to a suburban area for a quieter life.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາຍ້າຍໄປຢູ່ເຂດຊານເມືອງເພື່ອຊີວິດທີ່ງຽບສະຫງົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບທອດ, ສືບທອດ
meaning list.sentence: A succession of events led to her resignation.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫຼາຍໆເຫດການເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວລາອອກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບ​ຕໍ່ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The company achieved five successive years of growth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ບັນລຸການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຫ້າປີຕິດຕໍ່ກັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ສືບທອດ, ຜູ້ແທນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her successor will take over next month.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ສືບທອດຂອງລາວຈະເຂົ້າຮັບຕຳແໜ່ງໃນເດືອນໜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ດູດ, ດຶງ
meaning list.sentence: The baby sucked on the bottle eagerly.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍດູດຕຸກຢ່າງກະຕືລືລົ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຟ້ອງ, ຟ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: She decided to sue the company for damages.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕັດສິນໃຈຟ້ອງບໍລິສັດສໍາລັບຄ່າເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂ້າຕົວຕາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The novel explores themes of depression and suicide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະວະນິຍາຍຄົ້ນຄວ້າຫົວຂໍ້ຂອງການຊຶມເສົ້າແລະການຂ້າຕົວຕາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊຸດ, ຊຸດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They booked a luxurious suite for their honeymoon.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຈອງຫ້ອງພັກຟຸ່ມເຟືອຍສໍາລັບການ honeymoon ຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ສຸດຍອດ, ສຸດຍອດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The leaders gathered at the summit to discuss global issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບັນດາ​ຜູ້ນຳ​ໄດ້​ເຕົ້າ​ໂຮມ​ກັນ​ຢູ່​ທີ່​ກອງ​ປະຊຸມ​ເພື່ອ​ປຶກສາ​ຫາລື​ບັນຫາ​ທົ່ວ​ໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດສະຈັນ, ອັດສະຈັນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The meal was absolutely superb.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຫານແມ່ນເຮັດໃຫ້ປະລາດຢ່າງແທ້ຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ດີກວ່າ, ດີກວ່າ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: This product is superior in quality to its competitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜະລິດຕະພັນນີ້ແມ່ນດີກວ່າຄູ່ແຂ່ງຂອງຕົນໃນດ້ານຄຸນນະພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວບຄຸມ, ຕິດຕາມກວດກາ
meaning list.sentence: She was hired to supervise the construction site.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກຈ້າງໃຫ້ເບິ່ງແຍງສະຖານທີ່ກໍ່ສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການກວດສອບ, ການເຝົ້າລະວັງ
meaning list.sentence: The children are playing under the supervision of their parents.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍຫຼິ້ນພາຍໃຕ້ການຊີ້ນໍາຂອງພໍ່ແມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ກວດສອບ, ຜູ້ຄຸມງານ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The supervisor ensured that the work was completed on time.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ກວດສອບໄດ້ຮັບປະກັນວ່າວຽກງານດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ສໍາເລັດຕາມເວລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສີມ, ເສີມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He takes vitamin supplements every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວກິນວິຕາມິນເສີມທຸກໆເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມ, ເສີມ
meaning list.sentence: She supplemented her income by working extra hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເສີມລາຍໄດ້ຂອງລາວໂດຍການເຮັດຊົ່ວໂມງເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Her friends were very supportive during difficult times.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫມູ່ເພື່ອນຂອງລາວໄດ້ຮັບການສະຫນັບສະຫນູນຫຼາຍໃນຊ່ວງເວລາທີ່ຫຍຸ້ງຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່າວຫາ, ກ່າວຫາ
meaning list.sentence: The book is supposedly based on a true story.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຫນັງສືເຫຼັ້ມແມ່ນອີງໃສ່ເລື່ອງຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະກັດກັ້ນ, ສະກັດກັ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The government tried to suppress the protests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດຖະບານໄດ້ພະຍາຍາມສະກັດກັ້ນການປະທ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່, ສູງສຸດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The Supreme Court made a historic decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານສູງສຸດໄດ້ຕັດສິນເປັນປະຫວັດສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຫນັງຕີງ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: There was a sudden surge in demand for electric cars.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມຕ້ອງການລົດໄຟຟ້າເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຢ່າງກະທັນຫັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ, ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນ
meaning list.sentence: The crowd surged forward when the gates opened.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອປະຕູເປີດ, ຝູງຊົນໄດ້ແລ່ນໄປຂ້າງຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ການຜ່າຕັດ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She required surgical intervention after the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຊກແຊງການຜ່າຕັດແມ່ນຕ້ອງການຫຼັງຈາກອຸປະຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ເກີນ, ເກີນ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The farm produced a surplus of vegetables this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະສິກໍາໄດ້ຜະລິດຜັກເກີນດຸນໃນປີນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມແພ້, ຍອມແພ້
meaning list.sentence: The enemy forces surrendered after weeks of fighting.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກໍາລັງຂອງສັດຕູໄດ້ຍອມຈໍານົນຫຼັງຈາກການສູ້ຮົບຫຼາຍອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ການເຝົ້າລະວັງ, ການຕິດຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: The area is under constant surveillance.
