meaning list.sentence translation: ພື້ນທີ່ແມ່ນຢູ່ພາຍໃຕ້ການເຝົ້າລະວັງຢ່າງຕໍ່ເນື່ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການໂຈະ, ການເລື່ອນເວລາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The player faced a one-month suspension for breaking the rules.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ນໄດ້ຮັບການລະງັບຫນຶ່ງເດືອນສໍາລັບການລະເມີດກົດລະບຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໃສ, ສົງໃສ
meaning list.sentence: There was suspicion about his involvement in the crime.
meaning list.sentence translation: ມີຄວາມສົງໃສວ່າລາວມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມໃນອາຊະຍາກໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງໄສ, ສົງໄສ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police found his behavior suspicious.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ພົບ​ເຫັນ​ພຶດຕິກຳ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ທີ່​ໜ້າ​ສົງ​ໄສ.

meaning list.meaning: ສືບຕໍ່, ສືບຕໍ່
meaning list.sentence: The company aims to sustain its growth over the next decade.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດມີຈຸດປະສົງສືບຕໍ່ການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຂອງຕົນໃນທົດສະວັດຕໍ່ໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ແກວ່ງ, ແກວ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: The child swung back and forth on the playground swing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກຜູ້ຊາຍ swung ກັບໄປແລະດັງນີ້ຕໍ່ໄປ swing ໃນສະຫນາມເດັກຫຼິ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: Oscillation, sway (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The swing of the pendulum was mesmerizing.
meaning list.sentence translation: swing ຂອງ pendulum ໄດ້ fascinating.

meaning list.meaning: ດາບ
meaning list.sentence: The knight drew his sword to defend the kingdom.
meaning list.sentence translation: knight ໄດ້ draws sword ລາວເພື່ອປ້ອງກັນອານາຈັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ສັນຍາລັກ, ສັນຍາລັກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The handshake was a symbolic gesture of peace.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຈັບມືແມ່ນທ່າທາງສັນຍາລັກຂອງຄວາມສະຫງົບ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຣກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The doctor diagnosed her with a rare genetic syndrome.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ ໝໍ ໄດ້ວິນິດໄສວ່າລາວເປັນໂຣກທາງພັນທຸກໍາທີ່ຫາຍາກ.

meaning list.meaning: ການສັງເຄາະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The scientist conducted a synthesis of the chemical compounds.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ດໍາເນີນການສັງເຄາະທາດປະສົມເຄມີ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນລະບົບ, ເປັນລະບຽບ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: A systematic approach was required to solve the problem.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕ້ອງໃຊ້ວິທີການທີ່ເປັນລະບົບເພື່ອແກ້ໄຂບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ສູ້, ເອົາຊະນະ
meaning list.sentence: The new policies aim to tackle climate change.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະ​ໂຍບາຍ​ໃໝ່​ແນ​ໃສ່​ຕ້ານ​ການ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຂອງ​ດິນ​ຟ້າ​ອາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸດທະວິທີ, ຍຸດທະສາດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Their tactic was to focus on key areas for maximum impact.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍຸດທະວິທີຂອງພວກເຂົາແມ່ນເພື່ອສຸມໃສ່ຂົງເຂດທີ່ສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບຜົນກະທົບສູງສຸດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍຸດທະວິທີ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The army used tactical maneuvers to gain an advantage.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກອງທັບ​ໄດ້​ໃຊ້​ການ​ຊ້ອມ​ຮົບ​ຍຸດ​ທະ​ສາດ​ເພື່ອ​ໄດ້​ປຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ເສຍພາສີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Taxpayers expect the government to use their money wisely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເສຍພາສີຄາດວ່າລັດຖະບານຈະໃຊ້ເງິນຂອງພວກເຂົາຢ່າງສະຫລາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊັກຈູງ, ດຶງດູດ
meaning list.sentence: The smell of fresh bread tempted her into the bakery.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກິ່ນຫອມຂອງເຂົ້າຈີ່ສົດໄດ້ດຶງລາວໄປຫາຮ້ານເບເກີຣີ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ເຊົ່າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tenant complained about the leaking roof.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ເຊົ່າຈົ່ມກ່ຽວກັບມຸງຮົ່ວ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໂຍນ, ອ່ອນ (ນາມສະກຸນ)
meaning list.sentence: The meat was cooked until it was tender.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊີ້ນໄດ້ຖືກປຸງແຕ່ງຈົນກ່ວາອ່ອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິດຄອບຄອງ, ຊັບສິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His tenure as CEO lasted for ten years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອາຍຸການເປັນ CEO ຂອງລາວໄດ້ແກ່ຍາວເຖິງສິບປີ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນຂັ້ນຕອນສຸດທ້າຍ, fatal (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: She was diagnosed with a terminal illness.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ຖືກກວດພົບວ່າມີພະຍາດຢູ່ປາຍຍອດ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຖານີ, ສະຖານີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We waited at the airport terminal for our flight.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາລໍຖ້າຢູ່ໃນສະໜາມບິນສະໜາມບິນສຳລັບຖ້ຽວບິນຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິ້ນສຸດ, ຈົບ (ຄຳກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The company decided to terminate the contract early.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຕັດສິນໃຈຍົກເລີກສັນຍາໄວ.

meaning list.meaning: ດິນ, ດິນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The vehicle is designed to handle rough terrain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຍານພາຫະນະດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກອອກແບບສໍາລັບການນໍາໃຊ້ໃນ terrain rough.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດສະຈັນ, ອັດສະຈັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The concert last night was absolutely terrific.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄອນເສີດໃນຄືນທີ່ຜ່ານມາແມ່ນຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ແທ້ໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ເປັນພະຍານ, ພະຍານ
meaning list.sentence: The witness agreed to testify in court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະຍານໄດ້ຕົກລົງທີ່ຈະເປັນພະຍານໃນສານ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຈັກພະຍານ, ຖະແຫຼງການ
meaning list.sentence: Her testimony helped clarify the events of that night.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະຈັກ​ພະຍານ​ຂອງ​ເພິ່ນ​ໄດ້​ຊ່ວຍ​ໃຫ້​ຄວາມ​ສະຫວ່າງ​ແກ່​ເຫດການ​ໃນ​ຄືນ​ນັ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂຄງສ້າງ, ໂຄງສ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: The fabric has a soft and smooth texture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜ້າມີໂຄງສ້າງອ່ອນແລະລຽບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອບໃຈ, fortunately (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: Thankfully, no one was injured in the accident.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຊກດີທີ່ບໍ່ມີຜູ້ໃດໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບໃນອຸບັດຕິເຫດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະຄອນ, ລະຄອນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The actor gave a very theatrical performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສະແດງໄດ້ໃຫ້ການສະແດງລະຄອນຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາດ​ສະ​ຫນາ​ສາດ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: She studied theology at the university.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ສຶກສາສາດສະ ໜາ ຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ.

meaning list.meaning: ທິດສະດີ, ທິດສະດີ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The discussion was largely theoretical and lacked practical application.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສົນທະນາສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ແມ່ນທິດສະດີ ແລະຂາດການຈັດຕັ້ງປະຕິບັດຕົວຈິງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕໍ່ມາ, ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: He graduated in 2005 and started working as a lawyer shortly thereafter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຈົບການສຶກສາໃນປີ 2005 ແລະເລີ່ມເຮັດວຽກເປັນທະນາຍຄວາມບໍ່ດົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດັ່ງນັ້ນ, ໃນທາງນີ້ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: She forgot her umbrella, thereby getting soaked in the rain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ລືມ​ຄັນ​ຮົ່ມ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ຈຶ່ງ​ຖືກ​ຝົນ​ຕົກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄິດເຫັນ, ເຂົ້າໃຈ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He brought her flowers, which was a very thoughtful gesture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ເອົາດອກໄມ້ຂອງນາງ, ເຊິ່ງເປັນທ່າທາງທີ່ຄິດຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະຕຸ້ນຄວາມຄິດ, ກະຕຸ້ນໃຈ
meaning list.sentence: The documentary was thought-provoking and raised many important questions.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາລະຄະດີ​ໄດ້​ສ້າງ​ຄວາມ​ນຶກ​ຄິດ ​ແລະ ​ໄດ້​ຕັ້ງ​ຄຳ​ຖາມ​ທີ່​ສຳຄັນ​ຫຼາຍ​ຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະທູ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She used a red thread to sew the button back on.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນາງໄດ້ໃຊ້ເສັ້ນດ້າຍສີແດງເພື່ອຫຍິບປຸ່ມກັບຄືນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂອບເຂດ, ຂອບ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company is on the threshold of a major breakthrough.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດແມ່ນຢູ່ໃນ verge ຂອງຄວາມກ້າວຫນ້າທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕື່ນເຕັ້ນ, ດີໃຈຫຼາຍ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She was thrilled to receive the job offer.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕື່ນເຕັ້ນຫຼາຍທີ່ຈະໄດ້ຮັບການສະເຫນີວຽກ.

meaning list.meaning: ພັດທະນາ, ປະສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.
meaning list.sentence: The plants thrived in the rich soil and sunny climate.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພືດຈະເລີນເຕີບໂຕຢູ່ໃນດິນອຸດົມສົມບູນແລະສະພາບອາກາດບ່ອນມີແດດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກະແສ, ທ່າອ່ຽງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The tide brought in shells and seaweed.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກະແສນໍ້າໄດ້ນໍາເອົາແກະ ແລະສາຫຼ່າຍທະເລມາ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄັ່ງຕຶງ
meaning list.sentence: He tightened the screws on the chair.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຮັດສະກູໃສ່ເກົ້າອີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ໄມ້, ໄມ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The house was built with high-quality timber.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຮືອນແມ່ນເຮັດດ້ວຍໄມ້ທີ່ມີຄຸນນະພາບສູງ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນ​ເວ​ລາ​, ໃນ​ເວ​ລາ​ທີ່​ເຫມາະ​ສົມ (adjective​)
meaning list.sentence: Her timely arrival prevented a major delay.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການມາຮອດທັນເວລາຂອງລາວໄດ້ປ້ອງກັນຄວາມລ່າຊ້າທີ່ສໍາຄັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢາສູບ
meaning list.sentence: The farmer grows tobacco on his land.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວກະສິກອນປູກຢາສູບຢູ່ໃນດິນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອົດທົນ, ຄວາມອົດທົນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Tolerance is important in a multicultural society.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມທົນທານແມ່ນມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນໃນສັງຄົມຫຼາຍວັດທະນະທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທົນ, ທົນ
meaning list.sentence: She couldn't tolerate the noise from the construction site.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວບໍ່ສາມາດຢືນສຽງດັງທີ່ມາຈາກສະຖານທີ່ກໍ່ສ້າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າທຳນຽມ, ຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The toll for using the highway was quite expensive.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າທຳນຽມນຳໃຊ້ທາງຫຼວງແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງແພງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານ, ລື່ນກາຍ
meaning list.sentence: The new movie topped the box office charts.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາໃຫມ່ໄດ້ຜ່ານຕາຕະລາງ box office.

meaning list.meaning: ການທໍລະຍົດ
meaning list.sentence: The prisoner was subjected to severe torture.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກໂທດຖືກທໍລະມານຢ່າງໜັກ.

meaning list.meaning: ທໍລະມານ
meaning list.sentence: They tortured him to extract information.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ທໍລະມານລາວເພື່ອໃຫ້ໄດ້ຮັບຂໍ້ມູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖິ້ມ, ຖິ້ມ
meaning list.sentence: He tossed the ball to his friend.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໂຍນບານໃຫ້ເພື່ອນຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ເພື່ອເພີ່ມ, ສະຫຼຸບ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: The expenses totaled $500.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າໃຊ້ຈ່າຍທັງຫມົດແມ່ນ 500 ໂດລາ.

meaning list.meaning: ພິດ, ພິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The factory released toxic gases into the atmosphere.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງງານໄດ້ປ່ອຍອາຍພິດອອກສູ່ບັນຍາກາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕາມ, ສັນຍາລັກ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The investigators found traces of the missing person in the forest.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຄົ້ນຄວ້າໄດ້ພົບເຫັນຮ່ອງຮອຍຂອງຜູ້ຫາຍສາບສູນຢູ່ໃນປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄື່ອງໝາຍການຄ້າ
meaning list.sentence: The logo is a registered trademark of the company.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລໂກ້ແມ່ນເຄື່ອງໝາຍການຄ້າທີ່ຈົດທະບຽນຂອງບໍລິສັດ.

meaning list.meaning: Iz, patika (isim)
meaning list.sentence: They followed the hiking trail to the top of the mountain.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ໄດ້​ເດີນ​ຕາມ​ເສັ້ນທາງ​ຍ່າງ​ປ່າ​ໄປ​ສູ່​ຍອດ​ພູ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕິດຕາມ, ຕິດຕາມ
meaning list.sentence: The detective trailed the suspect for several hours.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກສືບໄດ້ຕິດຕາມຜູ້ຕ້ອງສົງໄສເປັນເວລາຫຼາຍຊົ່ວໂມງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວຢ່າງ, ຊິ້ນສ່ວນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The movie trailer got millions of views online.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕົວຢ່າງຮູບເງົາໄດ້ຖືກເບິ່ງຫຼາຍລ້ານເທື່ອທາງອອນລາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຸລະກຳ, ການເຄື່ອນໄຫວການຄ້າ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The bank transaction was completed successfully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເຮັດທຸລະກໍາທະນາຄານໄດ້ສໍາເລັດສົບຜົນສໍາເລັດ.

meaning list.meaning: transcript, ສຳເນົາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The court reporter provided a transcript of the trial.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ຂ່າວ​ສານ​ສະ​ໜອງ​ບົດ​ບັນ​ທຶກ​ການ​ພິ​ຈາ​ລະ​ນາ.

meaning list.meaning: ການປ່ຽນແປງ, ການປ່ຽນແປງ
meaning list.sentence: The city underwent a remarkable transformation in recent years.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະຄອນ​ໄດ້​ມີ​ການ​ຫັນປ່ຽນ​ຢ່າງ​ຕັ້ງໜ້າ​ໃນ​ຊຸມ​ປີ​ມໍ່ໆ​ມາ​ນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ການຂົນສົ່ງ, ການຂົນສົ່ງ
meaning list.sentence: The goods were damaged during transit.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສິນຄ້າໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເສຍຫາຍໃນລະຫວ່າງການຂົນສົ່ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ, ການແຜ່ກະຈາຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The transmission of the virus was faster than expected.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຜ່ລະບາດຂອງໄວຣັດແມ່ນໄວກວ່າທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມໂປ່ງໃສ
meaning list.sentence: Transparency in business dealings builds trust.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໂປ່ງໃສໃນການພົວພັນທາງທຸລະກິດສ້າງຄວາມໄວ້ວາງໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ໂປ່ງໃສ, ໂປ່ງໃສ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The glass was so transparent that it seemed invisible.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແກ້ວມີຄວາມໂປ່ງໃສຫຼາຍຈົນເກືອບເບິ່ງບໍ່ເຫັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບາດແຜ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The accident caused him severe emotional trauma.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອຸບັດຕິເຫດດັ່ງກ່າວເຮັດໃຫ້ລາວໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບທາງດ້ານຈິດໃຈຢ່າງຮ້າຍແຮງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົນທິສັນຍາ, ສັນຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The two countries signed a peace treaty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສອງ​ປະ​ເທດ​ໄດ້​ລົງ​ນາມ​ໃນ​ສົນ​ທິ​ສັນ​ຍາ​ສັນ​ຕິ​ພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ມະຫາສານ, ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The project required a tremendous amount of effort.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງການດັ່ງກ່າວຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີຄວາມພະຍາຍາມຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊົນເຜົ່າ, ຊົນເຜົ່າ
meaning list.sentence: The tribal customs are still followed in this region.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປະເພນີຊົນເຜົ່າຍັງປະຕິບັດຕາມຢູ່ໃນພາກພື້ນນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ສານ, ຄະນະ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The case was brought before an international tribunal.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ຖືກນຳຂຶ້ນສານສາກົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຄົາລົບ, ຍ້ອງຍໍ
meaning list.sentence: The memorial is a tribute to the soldiers who died in the war.
meaning list.sentence translation: ອານຸສາວະລີ​ແມ່ນ​ເຄື່ອງໝາຍ​ເຄົາລົບ​ນັບຖື​ບັນດາ​ທະຫານ​ເສຍ​ຊີວິດ​ໃນ​ສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ເຫດຜົນ, ເຫດຜົນ
meaning list.sentence: The event was the trigger for widespread protests.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຫດການ​ດັ່ງກ່າວ​ໄດ້​ເຮັດ​ໃຫ້​ເກີດ​ການ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ​ຢ່າງ​ກວ້າງຂວາງ.

meaning list.meaning: ກຸ່ມສາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The musical trio performed beautifully.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສາມ​ດົນ​ຕີ​ໄດ້​ໃຫ້​ການ​ສະ​ແດງ​ທີ່​ສວຍ​ງາມ​.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຊຊະນະ, ຜົນສຳເລັດ
meaning list.sentence: The victory was a triumph for the entire team.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຊຊະນະແມ່ນຜົນສໍາເລັດສໍາລັບທີມງານທັງຫມົດ.

meaning list.meaning: ລາງວັນ, ລາງວັນ
meaning list.sentence: The team won the championship trophy after a tough match.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທີມໄດ້ຊະນະຈອກແຊ້ມຫຼັງຈາກການແຂ່ງຂັນທີ່ເຄັ່ງຄັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີບັນຫາ, ມີບັນຫາ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The troubled company is struggling to stay afloat.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍ​ລິ​ສັດ​ທີ່​ມີ​ຄວາມ​ຫຍຸ້ງ​ຍາກ​ພະ​ຍາ​ຍາມ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຢູ່​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຢູ່​.

meaning list.meaning: ຜູ້ປົກຄອງ, ບຸກຄົນທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The trustee is responsible for managing the fund.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຜູ້ຄຸ້ມຄອງກອງທຶນແມ່ນຮັບຜິດຊອບໃນການຄຸ້ມຄອງກອງທຶນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄ່າຮຽນ
meaning list.sentence: The tuition fees at private universities can be very high.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄ່າຮຽນຢູ່ມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລເອກະຊົນສາມາດສູງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ການມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ, ການມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມ
meaning list.sentence: The event had an impressive turnout of over 500 people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ຮ່ວມ​ຂອງ 500 ກວ່າ​ຄົນ​ໃນ​ງານ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ແມ່ນ​ປະ​ທັບ​ໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ອັດຕາແລກປ່ຽນຂອງພະນັກງານ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The company reported a turnover of $2 million last year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ລາຍງານມູນຄ່າ 2 ລ້ານໂດລາສະຫະລັດໃນປີກາຍນີ້.

meaning list.meaning: ບິດ, ບິດ
meaning list.sentence: She twisted the lid off the jar.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພຣະອົງໄດ້ຫັນຝາຂອງກະປ໋ອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບິດ, ບິດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The story had an unexpected twist at the end.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເລື່ອງດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ບິດເບືອນທີ່ບໍ່ຄາດຄິດໃນຕອນທ້າຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກສຶກສາປະລິນຍາຕີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She is an undergraduate studying biology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເປັນນັກສຶກສາປະລິນຍາຕີທີ່ຮຽນຊີວະສາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ພື້ນຖານ, ພື້ນຖານ (ຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The report highlights the underlying causes of the issue.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບົດລາຍງານໄດ້ຍົກໃຫ້ເຫັນສາເຫດພື້ນຖານຂອງບັນຫາ.

meaning list.meaning: ທຳລາຍ, ທຳລາຍ
meaning list.sentence: Criticism from her colleagues undermined her confidence.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການວິພາກວິຈານຈາກເພື່ອນຮ່ວມງານຂອງລາວເຮັດໃຫ້ຄວາມເຊື່ອໝັ້ນຕົນເອງເສຍຫາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ແນ່ນອນ, ແນ່ນອນ (ຄໍາກິລິຍາ)
meaning list.sentence: She is undoubtedly the best candidate for the job.
meaning list.sentence translation: ແນ່ນອນ, ລາວເປັນຜູ້ສະຫມັກທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດສໍາລັບວຽກເຮັດງານທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມທົບ, ປະສົມປະສານ
meaning list.sentence: The new leader's goal is to unify the country.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເປົ້າ​ໝາຍ​ຂອງ​ຜູ້​ນຳ​ຄົນ​ໃໝ່​ແມ່ນ​ປະ​ເທດ​ເປັນ​ເອ​ກະ​ພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ເຄີຍມີມາກ່ອນ, ເປັນເອກະລັກ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The pandemic caused unprecedented challenges worldwide.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂລກລະບາດໄດ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດສິ່ງທ້າທາຍທີ່ບໍ່ເຄີຍມີມາກ່ອນໃນທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ອະທິບາຍ, ເປີດເຜີຍ
meaning list.sentence: The company unveiled its new product at the event.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີຜະລິດຕະພັນໃຫມ່ຂອງຕົນຢູ່ໃນເຫດການ.

meaning list.meaning: upcoming, ອະນາຄົດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The upcoming election will determine the country's future.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການເລືອກຕັ້ງທີ່ຈະມາເຖິງຈະກໍານົດອະນາຄົດຂອງປະເທດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກສູງ, ປັບປຸງ
meaning list.sentence: They upgraded the system to improve performance.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ຍົກລະດັບລະບົບເພື່ອປັບປຸງປະສິດທິພາບ.

meaning list.meaning: ຍົກລະດັບ, ການພັດທະນາ
meaning list.sentence: The software upgrade includes new features.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປັບປຸງຊອບແວປະກອບມີຄຸນສົມບັດໃຫມ່.

meaning list.meaning: ປ້ອງກັນ, ສະໜັບສະໜູນ
meaning list.sentence: The court upheld the decision of the lower court.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສານ​ໄດ້​ສະໜັບສະໜູນ​ການ​ຕັດສິນ​ຂອງ​ສານ​ຂັ້ນ​ລຸ່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການບໍລິການ, ຜົນປະໂຫຍດ
meaning list.sentence: Electricity and water are essential utilities.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄຟຟ້າ ແລະ ນ້ຳປະປາແມ່ນການບໍລິການພື້ນຖານ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃຊ້, ປະໂຫຍດ (ພະຍັນຊະນະ)
meaning list.sentence: She utilized her skills to complete the project.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ໃຊ້ທັກສະຂອງລາວເພື່ອເຮັດສໍາເລັດໂຄງການ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: The movie was utterly disappointing.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຮູບເງົາແມ່ນຄວາມຜິດຫວັງຢ່າງສົມບູນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊ່ອງຫວ່າງ, ສູນຍາກາດ
meaning list.sentence: The scientists created a vacuum in the laboratory.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ສ້າງສູນຍາກາດຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງທົດລອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ບໍ່ຊັດເຈນ, ບໍ່ຊັດເຈນ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: His explanation was too vague to understand.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄໍາອະທິບາຍຂອງລາວບໍ່ຊັດເຈນເກີນໄປທີ່ຈະເຂົ້າໃຈ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງ, ຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The validity of the contract was questioned.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມຖືກຕ້ອງຂອງສັນຍາໄດ້ຖືກຖາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫາຍໄປ, ຫາຍໄປ
meaning list.sentence: The magician made the coin vanish into thin air.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທັນທີທັນໃດ magician ໄດ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ຫຼຽນຫາຍໄປ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕົວແປ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The experiment involved several variables.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ທົດ​ລອງ​ກ່ຽວ​ຂ້ອງ​ກັບ​ຕົວ​ປ່ຽນ​ແປງ​ຈໍາ​ນວນ​ຫນຶ່ງ​.

meaning list.meaning: ປ່ຽນແປງໄດ້, indecisive (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The weather in this region is highly variable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະພາບອາກາດໃນພາກພື້ນນີ້ແມ່ນຂ້ອນຂ້າງປ່ຽນແປງ.

meaning list.meaning: ທີ່ແຕກຕ່າງກັນ, ທີ່ແຕກຕ່າງກັນ (adjective)
meaning list.sentence: The book includes a varied collection of short stories.
meaning list.sentence translation: ປຶ້ມດັ່ງກ່າວປະກອບດ້ວຍບົດເລື່ອງສັ້ນຕ່າງໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ເສັ້ນກ່າງ
meaning list.sentence: The doctor located the vein for the injection.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານຫມໍໄດ້ພົບເຫັນເສັ້ນກ່າງສໍາລັບການສັກຢາ.

meaning list.meaning: ສ່ຽງໄພ, ພະຍາຍາມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The business venture was both risky and rewarding.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລົງທືນຂອງທຸລະກິດແມ່ນມີທັງຄວາມສ່ຽງແລະລາງວັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ້າ, ພະຍາຍາມ
meaning list.sentence: She ventured into the forest despite the warnings.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຖິງວ່າຈະມີການເຕືອນໄພ, ລາວໄດ້ເຂົ້າໄປໃນປ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: verbal, verbal (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: They reached a verbal agreement on the terms of the contract.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າບັນລຸຂໍ້ຕົກລົງທາງວາຈາກ່ຽວກັບຂໍ້ກໍານົດຂອງສັນຍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕັດ​ສິນ​ຕັດ​ສິນ (ຄໍາ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: The jury reached a unanimous verdict of guilty.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະນະລູກຂຸນໄດ້ກັບຄືນຄໍາຕັດສິນຂອງຄວາມຜິດເປັນເອກກະສັນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຢືນຢັນ, ຢືນຢັນ
meaning list.sentence: The officer verified his identity before allowing him to enter.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຈົ້າຫນ້າທີ່ໄດ້ຢືນຢັນຕົວຕົນກ່ອນທີ່ຈະອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ລາວເຂົ້າໄປໃນ.

meaning list.meaning: ບົດກະວີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The poet wrote a beautiful verse about nature.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກກະວີໄດ້ຂຽນບົດທີ່ສວຍງາມກ່ຽວກັບທໍາມະຊາດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຕ້ານ (preposition)
meaning list.sentence: The match will be Team A versus Team B.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການແຂ່ງຂັນແມ່ນຈະແຂ່ງຂັນລະຫວ່າງທີມ A ແລະທີມ B.

meaning list.meaning: ເຮືອ, ເຮືອ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The vessel carried goods across the sea.
meaning list.sentence translation: ກຳ​ປັ່ນ​ບັນທຸກ​ສິນຄ້າ​ຂ້າມ​ທະ​ເລ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຮົບເກົ່າ, ຜູ້ມີປະສົບການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The war veteran shared his experiences with the students.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກ​ຮົບ​ເກົ່າ​ໄດ້​ແບ່ງ​ປັນ​ປະ​ສົບ​ການ​ກັບ​ນັກ​ຮຽນ.

meaning list.meaning: ປະຕິບັດໄດ້, ດໍາລົງຊີວິດ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Solar energy is a viable alternative to fossil fuels.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພະລັງງານແສງຕາເວັນແມ່ນເປັນທາງເລືອກທີ່ມີປະໂຫຍດຕໍ່ນໍ້າມັນເຊື້ອໄຟຟອດຊິວທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຊີວິດຊີວາ, ຫ້າວຫັນ (ຄຳຄຸນນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The city has a vibrant nightlife.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນະຄອນມີຊີວິດກາງຄືນທີ່ມີຊີວິດຊີວາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມຊົ່ວ, ຜິດສິນລະທຳ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Greed is considered a major vice in many cultures.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມໂລບຖືວ່າເປັນຄວາມຊົ່ວຮ້າຍທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ໃນຫຼາຍວັດທະນະທໍາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້າຍກາດ, ໂຫດຮ້າຍ
meaning list.sentence: The criminal was known for his vicious attacks.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄະດີອາຍາແມ່ນເປັນທີ່ຮູ້ຈັກສໍາລັບການໂຈມຕີທີ່ໂຫດຮ້າຍຂອງລາວ.

meaning list.meaning: ຊາວນາ
meaning list.sentence: The villagers gathered to celebrate the harvest festival.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາວບ້ານ​ເຕົ້າ​ໂຮມ​ກັນ​ເພື່ອ​ສະ​ເຫຼີ​ມສະຫຼອງ​ບຸນ​ເກັບ​ກ່ຽວ.

meaning list.meaning: ລະເມີດ, ລະເມີດ
meaning list.sentence: The company was fined for violating environmental laws.
meaning list.sentence translation: ບໍລິສັດໄດ້ຖືກປັບໃໝຍ້ອນລະເມີດກົດໝາຍສິ່ງແວດລ້ອມ.

meaning list.meaning: ການລະເມີດ, ການລະເມີດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The violation of human rights was condemned globally.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການລະເມີດສິດທິມະນຸດໄດ້ຖືກປະນາມທົ່ວໂລກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄຸນງາມຄວາມດີ, ຄຸນງາມຄວາມດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Patience is a virtue often praised by philosophers.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມອົດທົນເປັນຄຸນງາມຄວາມດີທີ່ນັກປັດຊະຍາໄດ້ຮັບການຍົກຍ້ອງເລື້ອຍໆ.

meaning list.meaning: ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ສຽງ​, sonorous (ຄໍາ​ຄຸນ​ນາມ​)
meaning list.sentence: She has been very vocal about her opinions on education reform.
meaning list.sentence translation: ທ່ານ​ໄດ້​ສະ​ແດງ​ຄວາມ​ເຫັນ​ກ່ຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ປະຕິ​ຮູບ​ການ​ສຶກສາ​ຢ່າງ​ຈະ​ແຈ້ງ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາບານ, ສັນຍາ
meaning list.sentence: He vowed to never repeat the same mistake.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວປະຕິຍານວ່າຈະບໍ່ເຮັດຜິດແບບດຽວກັນອີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວ, ຄວາມອ່ອນໄຫວ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The study focused on the vulnerabilities of small businesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການສຶກສາໄດ້ສຸມໃສ່ຄວາມອ່ອນແອຂອງທຸລະກິດຂະຫນາດນ້ອຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນໄຫວ, ອ່ອນໄຫວ (ຄໍານາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Children are more vulnerable to certain illnesses.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເດັກນ້ອຍມີຄວາມສ່ຽງຕໍ່ພະຍາດບາງຢ່າງ.

meaning list.meaning: ອຸປະຖໍາ, ບຸກຄົນພາຍໃຕ້ການປົກປ້ອງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The hospital ward was filled with patients.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຮງ​ໝໍ​ເຕັມ​ໄປ​ດ້ວຍ​ຄົນ​ເຈັບ.

meaning list.meaning: ສາງ, ສາງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The goods were stored in a large warehouse.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າເກັບຮັກສາສິນຄ້າຢູ່ໃນສາງຂະຫນາດໃຫຍ່.

meaning list.meaning: ສົງຄາມ, ສົງຄາມ
meaning list.sentence: Modern warfare often involves advanced technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສົງຄາມທີ່ທັນສະໄຫມມັກຈະກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບເຕັກໂນໂລຢີທີ່ກ້າວຫນ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃບຢັ້ງຢືນການອະນຸຍາດ, ການຮັບປະກັນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The police obtained a warrant to search the premises.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຕຳຫຼວດ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ໃບ​ສັ່ງ​ເຂົ້າ​ຄົ້ນ​ຫາ​ຊັບ​ສິນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮັບປະກັນ, to justify (verb)
meaning list.sentence: The situation warrants immediate action.
meaning list.sentence translation: ສະຖານະການພຽງແຕ່ເປັນການແຊກແຊງອັນຮີບດ່ວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ນັກຮົບ
meaning list.sentence: The warrior fought bravely in the battle.
meaning list.sentence translation: ນັກຮົບຕໍ່ສູ້ຢ່າງກ້າຫານໃນສົງຄາມ.

meaning list.meaning: ອ່ອນເພຍ, ອ່ອນເພຍ
meaning list.sentence: The long drought has weakened the crops.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໄພແຫ້ງແລ້ງຍາວນານເຮັດໃຫ້ພືດລົ້ມລຸກ.

meaning list.meaning: ຖັກແສ່ວ, ຖັກແສ່ວ
meaning list.sentence: She weaved the basket from straw.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ຖູ​ກະຕ່າ​ເຟືອງ.

meaning list.meaning: ພືດ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: We need to remove the weeds from the garden.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຮົາຈໍາເປັນຕ້ອງເອົາຫຍ້າອອກຈາກສວນ.

meaning list.meaning: ດີ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The village relies on a well for drinking water.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໝູ່​ບ້ານ​ແມ່ນ​ອາໄສ​ໜອງ​ນ້ຳ​ດື່ມ.

meaning list.meaning: ສະຫວັດດີພາບ, ສະຫວັດດີການ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Exercise is essential for mental and physical well-being.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການອອກກໍາລັງກາຍເປັນສິ່ງສໍາຄັນສໍາລັບສຸຂະພາບຈິດແລະທາງດ້ານຮ່າງກາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນທາງໃດກໍ່ຕາມ, ທັງຫມົດ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: I have no interest in the matter whatsoever.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຂ້ອຍບໍ່ມີຄວາມສົນໃຈໃນຫົວຂໍ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຜ່ານນີ້, ດັ່ງນັ້ນ (adverb)
meaning list.sentence: They introduced a new system whereby employees can work remotely.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າໄດ້ນໍາສະເຫນີລະບົບໃຫມ່ທີ່ພະນັກງານສາມາດເຮັດວຽກຫ່າງໄກສອກຫຼີກ.

meaning list.meaning: ໃນຂະນະທີ່, ໃນລະຫວ່າງ (ການສົມທົບ)
meaning list.sentence: She read a book whilst waiting for the bus.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອ່ານຫນັງສືໃນຂະນະທີ່ລໍຖ້າລົດເມ.

meaning list.meaning: whip, ຍ້າຍໄວ
meaning list.sentence: He whipped the horse to make it run faster.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວຕີມ້າເພື່ອເຮັດໃຫ້ມັນແລ່ນໄວຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ສົມບູນ, ສົມບູນ
meaning list.sentence: The project is wholly funded by private investors.
meaning list.sentence translation: ໂຄງ​ການ​ດັ່ງ​ກ່າວ​ແມ່ນ​ໄດ້​ຮັບ​ທຶນ​ຢ່າງ​ເຕັມ​ສ່ວນ​ໂດຍ​ນັກ​ລົງ​ທຶນ​ເອ​ກະ​ຊົນ.

meaning list.meaning: ຂະຫຍາຍ, ຂະຫຍາຍ
meaning list.sentence: They plan to widen the road to reduce traffic.
meaning list.sentence translation: ພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າວາງແຜນທີ່ຈະຂະຫຍາຍເສັ້ນທາງເພື່ອຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການສັນຈອນ.

meaning list.meaning: ແມ່ໝ້າຍ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: She became a widow after her husband passed away.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວໄດ້ກາຍເປັນແມ່ຫມ້າຍຫຼັງຈາກພັນລະຍາຂອງລາວເສຍຊີວິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ກວ້າງ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The width of the table is two meters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມກວ້າງຂອງຕາຕະລາງແມ່ນສອງແມັດ.

meaning list.meaning: ຄວາມເຕັມໃຈ, ອາສາສະໝັກ
meaning list.sentence: Her willingness to help others is admirable.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຄວາມ​ເຕັມ​ໃຈ​ຂອງ​ລາວ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຊ່ວຍ​ຄົນ​ອື່ນ​ເປັນ​ທີ່​ໜ້າ​ຊົມ​ເຊີຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ລົບ, ລ້າງ
meaning list.sentence: She wiped the table clean with a cloth.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວເຮັດຄວາມສະອາດໂຕະດ້ວຍຜ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ປັນຍາ, ປັນຍາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is known for his quick wit and humor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວ​ເປັນ​ທີ່​ຮູ້​ຈັກ​ສໍາ​ລັບ​ການ wit ໄວ​ແລະ humor ລາວ​.

meaning list.meaning: ຖອນ, ຖອນ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The withdrawal of troops from the area has begun.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການ​ຖອນ​ທະຫານ​ອອກ​ຈາກ​ພາກ​ພື້ນ​ໄດ້​ເລີ່​ມຂຶ້ນ.

meaning list.meaning: ອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ, ການຝຶກອົບຮົມ
meaning list.sentence: She does a 30-minute workout every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວອອກກໍາລັງກາຍ 30 ນາທີທຸກໆເຊົ້າ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຫວ້, ບູຊາ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The temple is a place of worship for many people.
meaning list.sentence translation: ວັດ​ເປັນ​ບ່ອນ​ບູຊາ​ຂອງ​ຄົນ​ທັງຫຼາຍ.

meaning list.meaning: ໄຫວ້, ໄຫວ້
meaning list.sentence: They worship in the church every Sunday.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເຂົາເຈົ້ານະມັດສະການຢູ່ໂບດທຸກໆວັນອາທິດ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄ່າ, ມີຄ່າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: Helping others is a worthwhile endeavor.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອຄົນອື່ນແມ່ນຄວາມພະຍາຍາມທີ່ຄຸ້ມຄ່າ.

meaning list.meaning: ມີຄ່າ, ມີຄ່າ (ຄຳນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: He is worthy of our respect and admiration.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລາວສົມຄວນໄດ້ຮັບຄວາມເຄົາລົບແລະຊົມເຊີຍຂອງພວກເຮົາ.

meaning list.meaning: ຮ້ອງ, ຮ້ອງ
meaning list.sentence: She yelled for help when she saw the fire.
meaning list.sentence translation: ເມື່ອ​ເຫັນ​ໄຟ​ໄໝ້, ລາວ​ຈຶ່ງ​ຮ້ອງ​ຂໍ​ຄວາມ​ຊ່ວຍ​ເຫຼືອ.

meaning list.meaning: ສິນຄ້າ, ກຳໄລ
meaning list.sentence: The farm's yield was higher than expected this year.
meaning list.sentence translation: ການປູກພືດຂອງກະສິກໍາໃນປີນີ້ແມ່ນສູງກວ່າທີ່ຄາດໄວ້.

meaning list.meaning: ຍອມ, ຍອມແພ້
meaning list.sentence: The government refused to yield to the demands of the protesters.
meaning list.sentence translation: ລັດ​ຖະ​ບານ​ປະ​ຕິ​ເສດ​ທີ່​ຈະ​ຍອມ​ຮັບ​ຕໍ່​ການ​ຮຽກ​ຮ້ອງ​ຂອງ​ພວກ​ປະ​ທ້ວງ.

meaning list.meaning: ຫນຸ່ມ (ນາມ)
meaning list.sentence: The youngster showed great potential in football.
meaning list.sentence translation: ຊາຍຫນຸ່ມໄດ້ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນທ່າແຮງທີ່ຍິ່ງໃຫຍ່ໃນການແຂ່ງຂັນບານເຕະ.
